original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi smon lam dang / ji ltar rkang bkra gdul ba'i phyir skye bo mang po la yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' gang yin zhig sgrib pa med par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byungüîΩba la snyoms par 'jug pa na sems can thams cad kyis bde ba rab tu 'thob pa @62a *//
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi smon lam dang / ji ltar rkang bkra gdul ba'i phyir skye bo mang po la yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' gang yin zhig sgrib pa med par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa na sems can thams cad kyis bde ba rab tu 'thob pa @62a *//
translated: The perfection of diligence in samsara is the diligence of the bodhisattva Avalokitesvara in his vow, and the diligence of the bodhisattva Jyotiska in his vow to be reborn in the hells for the sake of sentient beings.

original: gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation in samsara is the meditation of the bodhisattva who, when he enters the samadhi called ‚Äúunobstructed manifestation,‚Äù causes all sentient beings to obtain happiness.

original: bdag gi don byang chub kyi sku dang mos pa sna tshogs pa dag gi don kun nas shes pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gi don byang chub kyi sku dang mos pa sna tshogs pa dag gi don kun nas shes pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom in samsara is the wisdom of the bodhisattva who, by means of the body of enlightenment and various inclinations, knows the meaning of all things.

original: 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the other shore of cyclic existence.

original: de la thun mong pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thun mong pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six common perfections?

original: sbyin pa'i smon lam gyis yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i smon lam gyis yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving that is dedicated by the aspiration for giving is the common perfection of giving.

original: sems can rlabs tu sbyor bar yongs su bzung ba'i nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbyin gyis brlabs yongs su bzung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rlabs tu sbyor bar yongs su bzung ba'i nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // byin gyis brlabs yongs su bzung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The morality that is taken up in order to help sentient beings and that is accompanied by appropriation is the common perfection of morality.üîΩThe patience that is accompanied by blessing is the common perfection of patience.

original: snying rje dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The effort that is accompanied by compassion is the common perfection of effort.

original: skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dus su yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dus su yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni thun mong pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation that is com m on is the m editation that is com pletely m atured and com pletely dedicated at the right time in order to benefit m any beings.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni thun @62b mong pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni thun @62b mong pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom that is com m on is the param ita of w isdom that is not confused about the latent potentiality of the seeds.

original: 'di dag ni thun mong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thun mong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas that are com m on.

original: de la thun mong ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thun mong ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas that are not common?

original: spobs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa dang / gang spobs ba sna tshogs bskyed pa 'grub pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa dang / gang spobs ba sna tshogs bskyed pa 'grub pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of giving ‚Äòthat is not com m on‚Äô is the param ita of giving that is the accom plishm ent of the realization of eloquence and the accom plishm ent of the arising of various kinds of eloquence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' khyim la mngon par mi dga' ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' khyim la mngon par mi dga' ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is not shared in common is the morality of the bodhisattva who does not delight in the household life.

original: rton pa thun mong ma yin pa zab mo'i chos la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
analyzed: rton pa thun mong ma yin pa zab mo'i chos la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
translated: The perfection of patience that is not shared in common is the patience of one who has the profound Dharma-patience.

original: dpag tu med par 'byung ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dpag tu med par 'byung ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is not shared in common is the effort that is inexhaustible.

original: sems can la sgom pa dang / chos la lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la sgom pa dang / chos la lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation that is not shared in common is the meditation of one who meditates on beings, who meditates with the highest thought on the Dharma, and who meditates with the aspects of emptiness.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / chos gnyis rtogs pa las 'byung ba dang / cang shes kyi las gnyis la rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de @63a *//
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / chos gnyis rtogs pa las 'byung ba dang / cang shes kyi las gnyis la rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de @63a *//
translated: It is to engage in the correct understanding of meaning, the correct understanding of definitions, and the correct understanding of phenomena. It is to arise from the realization of the two kinds of Dharma. It is to be skilled in the two kinds of activity of the skilled.üîΩ

original: ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is not shared is the wisdom that is the understanding of the individual, the understanding of the meaning, the understanding of language, and the understanding of phenomena, that arises from the realization of the two phenomena, and that is the knowledge of the two activities of the one who knows.

original: 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are not shared.

original: de la rnam par bged pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par bged pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of distribution?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving that arises from the perfection of giving and the perfection of giving that is accomplished is the perfection of distributed giving.

original: de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci rigs par lus la yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci rigs par lus la yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the perfection of giving away the limbs and minor parts of the body, as appropriate.

original: 'khor gyi nang na nges par gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang na nges par gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the perfection of patience that is established in the midst of the retinue.üîΩThe perfection of effort is the perfection of effort that accomplishes all goals.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;sngon gyi gnas shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir shes pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rolüîΩtu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;sngon gyi gnas shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir shes pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rolüîΩtu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the perfection of concentration that abides in knowledge for the sake of realizing the knowledge of former lives.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of wisdom that is not attached to the three world systems.

original: bden pa yod pa la rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa yod pa la rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bged pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is the realization of the existence of the truth is the perfection of wisdom of distribution.

original: 'di @63b dag ni rnam par bged pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di @63b dag ni rnam par bged pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of distribution.

original: de la rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that are not fully matured?

original: ji ltar chu bo nee ranydza na'i 'gram du zas rnyed nas dka' ba spyad pa spyod par kun tu ston par byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa smin pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar chu bo nee ranydza na'i 'gram du zas rnyed nas dka' ba spyad pa spyod par kun tu ston par byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa smin pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is not fully matured is the blessing that demonstrates the practice of austerities by finding food on the banks of the Naira√±janƒÅ River.

original: ji ltar rgyu skar nyis stong lnga brgya'i sprul pa la zhugs shing chu bo gangg'a'i 'gram na mi dmigs par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu skar nyis stong lnga brgya'i sprul pa la zhugs shing chu bo gangg'a'i 'gram na mi dmigs par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is not fully matured is the non-apprehending that occurs on the banks of the Ganges River through the emanation of two thousand five hundred stars.

original: lus dang ngag dang / sems dmigs pa med pas phye ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang / sems dmigs pa med pas phye ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience that is distinguished by the non-objectification of body, speech, and mind is the patience perfection without maturation.

original: rnam par brtags pa med pa'i rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa med pa'i rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The effort that is not conceptually fabricated is the effort perfection without maturation.

original: 'gog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩzad pa med par 'gyur ba'i lhag mthong gi shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // zad pa med par 'gyur ba'i lhag mthong gi shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The concentration that abides in the stage of cessation is the concentration perfection without maturation.

original: rnam par smin pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The wisdom of insight that is not exhausted is the wisdom perfection without maturation.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections without maturation.

original: de la ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six essential perfections?

original: rlom sems med pa'i @64a *//
analyzed: rlom sems med pa'i @64a *//
translated: The effort that is not conceptually fabricated is the effort perfection without maturation.üîΩThe concentration that abides in the stage of cessation is the concentration perfection without maturation.üîΩThe wisdom of insight that is not exhausted is the wisdom perfection without maturation.üîΩThese are the six perfections without maturation.üîΩ‚ÄúWhat are the six essential perfections?

original: sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This giving is the perfection of giving that is in its very nature.

original: sems la rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems la rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This morality is the perfection of morality that is in its very nature.

original: bdag med par bzod pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med par bzod pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This patience is the perfection of patience that is in its very nature.

original: bdag med par dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med par dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This effort is the perfection of effort that is in its very nature.

original: phyi dang nang la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This meditation is the perfection of meditation that is in its very nature.

original: chos thams cad la phyin ci log med par btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la phyin ci log med par btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This wisdom is the perfection of wisdom that is in its very nature.

original: 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are in their very nature.

original: de la dngos po med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the non-existence of things?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i sems sbyin pa la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i sems sbyin pa la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The non-existence of things in the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving is the non-existence of the future mind that has not yet entered into giving.

original: zad pas rab tu phye ba'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: zad pas rab tu phye ba'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality of the non-existence of things is the vow that is distinguished by exhaustion.

original: dge ba'i 'du shes can dang / mi dge ba'i 'du shes can du spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i 'du shes can dang / mi dge ba'i 'du shes can du spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience of the non-existence of things is the non-elaboration of the notion of virtue and the notion of non-virtue.

original: lam la rtsol pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i brtson @64b 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lam la rtsol pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i brtson @64b 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort of the non-existence of things is the effort on the path.

original: khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems gang du ji lta ba bzhin rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems gang du ji lta ba bzhin rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of concentration of the non-existence of things is the mind that is not attached to the three realms, which is in accord with reality.

original: 'de la 'dus byas kyi 'du shes can dang / gang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes can med par rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste //
analyzed: 'de la 'dus byas kyi 'du shes can dang / gang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes can med par rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste //
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is not a thing is the practice of those who have no perception of the compounded or the uncompounded.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the bodhisattvas‚Äô six perfections that are not things.

original: de la rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six extensive perfections?

original: sems can dpag tu med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Extensive generosity is the generosity of those who dedicate their generosity to infinite beings.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Extensive morality is the morality of those who practice in all ways.

original: sbyor ba la mi ltos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba la mi ltos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Extensive patience is the patience of those who do not rely on practice.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is the effort which arises from the application of mindfulness is the vast perfection of effort.

original: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu sgrub par byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba khong du chud cing smon lam mkhas 'ches pa gang yin pa @65a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu sgrub par byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgya che ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba khong du chud cing smon lam mkhas 'ches pa gang yin pa @65a *//
translated: The perfection of meditation that accomplishes the eighty-four thousand concentrations is the vast perfection of meditation.

original: de ni rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de ni rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is the skill in the aspiration which comprehends the defilement and purification of all sentient beings is the vast perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of vastness.

original: de la rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of increase?

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la 'jigs par lta bar dam bcas gang yin pa de
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la 'jigs par lta bar dam bcas gang yin pa de
translated: This is the perfection of generosity of the generosity that has sixteen aspects, which is endowed with the Dharma of irreversibility.

original: ni rgyas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ni rgyas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of the morality that is committed to seeing danger even in a trifling offense.

original: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience of the patience that is free from attachment and aversion.

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of effort of the effort that is applied without offense.

original: snying rje chen po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of meditation of the meditation that is endowed with great compassion.

original: thogs pa med par ston pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med par ston pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni rgyas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who teaches without obstruction is the perfection of wisdom of expansion.

original: 'di dag ni rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of expansion.

original: de la mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of infinity?

original: shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of infinity is the generosity of one who is endowed with wisdom.

original: phan par @65b 'dod pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phan par @65b 'dod pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of infinity is the morality of one who is endowed with the Dharma of desire for benefit.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of infinity is the patience of one who is patient with the three doors of liberation.

original: yang dag par shin tu sbyangs pa'i gzhi'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par shin tu sbyangs pa'i gzhi'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The effort of the basis of right effort is the perfection of effort that is infinite.

original: byams pa la sbyong zhing byang chub kyi yan lag la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byams pa la sbyong zhing byang chub kyi yan lag la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The concentration that is applied to love and is focused on the branches of enlightenment is the perfection of concentration that is infinite.

original: mtha' yas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The wisdom of the analytical knowledges is the perfection of wisdom that is infinite.

original: 'di dag ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are infinite.

original: de la tshol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of seeking?

original: rab tu byung ba lhung bzed thogs nas ji snyed pa yang dag par bged pa gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba lhung bzed thogs nas ji snyed pa yang dag par bged pa gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving of seeking is the giving of the renunciate who, holding his alms bowl, distributes everything he has.

original: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The morality of the virtues of purification is the perfection of morality of search.

original: thos pa'i gzhi dang / dge ba'i gzhi dag las sdug bsngal la mi mjed pa ni /
analyzed: thos pa'i gzhi dang / dge ba'i gzhi dag las sdug bsngal la mi mjed pa ni /
translated: The patience of not being upset by the bases of hearing and the bases of virtue

original: dper na / rgyal bo'i mgo dang / btsun mo yongs su gtong ba lta bu dang / gang gi tshe yang dag par so sor brtags @66a *//
analyzed: dper na / rgyal bo'i mgo dang / btsun mo yongs su gtong ba lta bu dang / gang gi tshe yang dag par so sor brtags @66a *//
translated: is like the giving up of the king's head and queen, and the patience of taking up through right discrimination.

original: pas dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: pas dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience of search.

original: mar me mdzad kyi sngon rol tu sdug bsngal bas dge ba legs par sgrub pa na yongs su mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mar me mdzad kyi sngon rol tu sdug bsngal bas dge ba legs par sgrub pa na yongs su mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The vigor of not being discouraged by suffering when accomplishing virtue from the time of Dipankara on is the perfection of vigor of search.

original: rtog dpyod dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan lhag mthong gis shas che ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rtog dpyod dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan lhag mthong gis shas che ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The concentration of search is the perfection of concentration of search, which is the concentration with investigation and analysis, and which is predominantly insight.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyis stong pa nyid kyi don tshol ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyis stong pa nyid kyi don tshol ba gang yin pa de ni tshol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of discerning wisdom is the search for the meaning of emptiness by means of the reason of dependent origination.

original: 'di dag ni tshol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni tshol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of searching.

original: de la brgal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brgal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of crossing over?

original: dbul po 'joms par 'gyur pa khyim bdag rin po che sgrub par byed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dbul po 'joms par 'gyur pa khyim bdag rin po che sgrub par byed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of crossing over is the perfection of generosity of the precious householder who accomplishes the destruction of poverty.üîΩThe perfection of morality of crossing over is the morality of protecting the ten wholesome courses of action, the ripening of which is bestowed on other beings.

original: gang gi tshe dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag kun nas srung ba rnam par smin pa skye bo gzhan la stob pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyi dang du len pa
analyzed: gang gi tshe dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag kun nas srung ba rnam par smin pa skye bo gzhan la stob pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyi dang du len pa
translated: The perfection of patience of crossing over is the patience of accepting the ten wholesome courses of action, the ripening of which is bestowed on other beings.

original: gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience of the one who has crossed over.

original: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang pa'i phyir nges @66b par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang pa'i phyir nges @66b par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The thought of renunciation in order to abandon the thought of desire is the perfection of vigor of the one who has crossed over.

original: rnam par 'tshe ba spang ba'i phyir snyoms pa med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'tshe ba spang ba'i phyir snyoms pa med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The concentration that is not indifferent in order to abandon harmfulness is the perfection of concentration of the one who has crossed over.

original: khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid la nye bar rtog pa bdag med pas nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni brgal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid la nye bar rtog pa bdag med pas nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brgal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / 'di dag ni brgal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The wisdom that is the realization of the characteristic of suffering in the three realms through the selflessness that is renunciation is the perfection of wisdom of the one who has crossed over.üîΩThese are the six perfections of the one who has crossed over.

original: de la mngon par dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of delight?

original: 'dod pa thams cad 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir lha dang me'i 'gro bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nga rgyal med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir lha dang me'i 'gro bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nga rgyal med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of one who is free of pride, whose generosity will ripen in the destinies of gods and humans, in order to obtain all that one could wish for, is the perfection of generosity that is truly pleasing.

original: lha dang mi'i 'gro ba dag tu tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i 'gro ba dag tu tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The morality that leads to a long life in the destinies of gods and humans is the perfection of morality that is truly pleasing.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The patience that is the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas is the perfection of patience that is truly pleasing.

original: rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The effort that is the fruitful effort is the perfection of effort that is truly pleasing.

original: bdag nyid yon tan gyi rnam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam par @67a *//
analyzed: bdag nyid yon tan gyi rnam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam par @67a *//
translated: In order to attain the various good qualities, and in order to benefit oneself and others,üîΩ

original: smin pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang / smon lam thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: smin pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang / smon lam thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation ‚Äúof great delight‚Äù is the m editation that is the cause for attaining the various aspects of virtue, for the m aturation of the cause of benefit for oneself and others, for the attainment of the aspiration, and for the realization of the truth just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa thams cad khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir chos nyan pa ni mngon par dga' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa thams cad khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir chos nyan pa ni mngon par dga' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom ‚Äúof great delight‚Äù is the w isdom of listening to the Dharma in order to understand all the activities of the Tathagata.

original: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of great delight.

original: de la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six paramitas that are not of great delight?

original: nor dang zas dang gos la sogs pa la ma chags shing /
analyzed: nor dang zas dang gos la sogs pa la ma chags shing /
translated: The param ita of giving ‚Äúthat is not of great delight‚Äù is the giving of one who is not attached to wealth, food, clothing, and so forth.

original: lan la re ba med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: lan la re ba med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni /
translated: They give completely, without any expectation of reward.

original: mngon par dga' ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the giving that is done with complete generosity, without any expectation of return.

original: nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa khyim na gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩ'gyod pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa khyim na gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'gyod pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the moral practice of one who is definitely intent on renunciation, yet lives at home.üîΩThe perfection of patience is the patience of one who is free from regret.

original: sdug bsngal spang ba'i phyir brtson pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal spang ba'i phyir brtson pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the effort of one who strives to eliminate suffering.

original: ris me 'thun par song ste sdug bsngal yang dag par 'byung ba dang @67b rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ris me 'thun par song ste sdug bsngal yang dag par 'byung ba dang @67b rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration that is not delight is the concentration that is not associated with the characteristics of attachment and aversion that lead to the arising of suffering.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is not delight is the wisdom of the bodhisattva who is not attached to the three realms.

original: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are not delight.

original: de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of retaining what one has heard?

original: gang zag la chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa 'di dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag la chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa 'di dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity of the gift of Dharma to people, and also the perfection of generosity of the gift of Dharma to those who teach, recite, and memorize it.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi tshig bdun gyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su spyod par yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi tshig bdun gyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su spyod par yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of the one who holds what is heard is the moral practice of body, speech, and mind that is undertaken by the seven types of Dharma-virtue words.

original: legs par gsungs pa'i tshig gcig tsam gyi ched du sdug bsngal dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' bram zer gyur pa na skyes pa'i rabs khong du chud par bya ba'i nod du gdol pa las mnyan pa'i @68a *//
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i tshig gcig tsam gyi ched du sdug bsngal dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' bram zer gyur pa na skyes pa'i rabs khong du chud par bya ba'i nod du gdol pa las mnyan pa'i @68a *//
translated: The perfection of patience of the one who holds what is heard is the patience of one who endures suffering for the sake of even a single word of the well-spoken Dharma.üîΩThe perfection of effort of the one who holds what is heard is the effort of one who, for the sake of a single word of the well-spoken Dharma, would endure being burned at the stake.üîΩThe perfection of meditation of the one who holds what is heard is the meditation of one who, for the sake of a single word of the well-spoken Dharma, would endure being burned at the stake.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom of the one who holds what is heard is the wisdom of one who, for the sake of a single word of the well-spoken Dharma, would endure being burned at the stake.

original: phyir lo bcu gnyis su bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyir lo bcu gnyis su bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of patience of one who upholds the teachings is the patience of one who is honored for twelve years.

original: nges par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of effort of one who upholds the teachings is the effort of one who focuses on liberation.

original: sems mi rtag pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems mi rtag pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation of one who upholds the teachings is the m editation of one who focuses on the impermanence of the m ind.

original: slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams yang dag pa'i dge ba sbyor du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams yang dag pa'i dge ba sbyor du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom of one who upholds the teachings is the w isdom of one who, w ithout being parsimonious like a teacher, causes both friends and enemies to engage in true virtue.

original: 'di dag ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thos pa 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of one who upholds the teachings.

original: de la 'khor bar yun ring ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor bar yun ring ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of one who remains in samsara for a long time?

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsnying rje chen pos rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // snying rje chen pos rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
translated: The perfection of generosity that is dedicated to the acceptance of the non-arising of all things is the perfection of generosity that is dedicated to a long time in cyclic existence.üîΩThe perfection of morality that is dedicated to the great compassion and is not dedicated to the destruction of the afflictions is the perfection of morality that is dedicated to a long time in cyclic existence.

original: smon lam gyis yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i @68b pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyis yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i @68b pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience that is dedicated by means of the vow is the perfection of patience that is dedicated to a long time in cyclic existence.

original: thos par yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;bdag med pa'i rnam par yongs su bsngos pa bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar
analyzed: thos par yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;bdag med pa'i rnam par yongs su bsngos pa bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar
translated: The param ita of effort that is dedicated to listening to the Dharma is the param ita of effort that is dedicated to the long duration of samsara.üîΩThe param ita of m editation that is dedicated to the aspect of selflessness is the param ita of m editation that is dedicated to the long duration of samsara.

original: yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom that is the w isdom of the irreversible stage is the param ita of w isdom that is dedicated to the long duration of samsara.

original: 'di dag ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'khor bar yun ring bar yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas that are dedicated to the long duration of samsara.

original: de la rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas that are uninterrupted?

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving by means of the four means of gathering disciples is the perfection of giving without interruption.

original: legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality by means of the three kinds of good conduct is the perfection of morality without interruption.

original: lus dang / sems dang / so sor brtags pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la bzod pa ni bzod pa bzhi po ste /
analyzed: lus dang / sems dang / so sor brtags pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la bzod pa ni bzod pa bzhi po ste /
translated: There are four kinds of patience: patience with regard to physical and mental suffering, patience in accepting difficulties, patience in clarifying doubts, and patience in acknowledging the virtues of others.

original: bzod pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩyang dag pa'i spong ba bzhis ma thogs shing kun nas dkris pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun @69a *//
analyzed: bzod pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhis ma thogs shing kun nas dkris pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun @69a *//
translated: The perfection of patience without interruption is the perfection of patience by means of these four kinds of patience.

original: chad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort without interruption is the perfection of effort by means of the four right efforts.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation that is the four close mindfulnesses is the param ita of m editation that is w ithout interruption.

original: bden pa bzhi rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom that is the knowledge of the four noble truths is the param ita of w isdom that is w ithout interruption.

original: 'di dag ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas that are w ithout interruption.

original: de la 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas dedicated to the full maturation of the sense pleasures?

original: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin la /
analyzed: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin la /
translated: The param ita of giving that is the giving of all one has is the param ita of giving dedicated to the full m aturation of the sense pleasures.

original: de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid la blta bar bya ba de'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid la blta bar bya ba de'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of generosity, the dedication of the full maturation of the sense-qualities to the emptiness gate of liberation.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phan pa'i sems kyis gang skye ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod par yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phan pa'i sems kyis gang skye ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod par yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the dedication of the full maturation of the sense-qualities to the morality that is the intention to benefit sentient beings in order to bring them to full maturity.

original: yongs su brtul na rjes su mthun pa'i yul la dang du len pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par @69b bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su brtul na rjes su mthun pa'i yul la dang du len pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par @69b bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the patience that is the acceptance of the agreeable object when it is thoroughly investigated, the dedication of the full maturation of the sense-qualities.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sems kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩdus shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshad med pa byams pa dang / snying rje gnyis po 'di dag gis pha rol sdug bsngal ba dag bde bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sems kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // dus shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshad med pa byams pa dang / snying rje gnyis po 'di dag gis pha rol sdug bsngal ba dag bde bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the effort to bring to maturity in accordance with the mundane aspirations of beings.üîΩThe perfection of meditation is the meditation of one who, through the two immeasurables of love and compassion, brings happiness to others who are suffering.

original: dpyod pa la rab tu sbyor zhing dus dang dus ma yin pa la ltos pa byams pa dang / snying rje bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dpyod pa la rab tu sbyor zhing dus dang dus ma yin pa la ltos pa byams pa dang / snying rje bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom of one who, through love and compassion, is intent on analysis and is concerned with the right and wrong time.

original: 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections dedicated to the full maturation of the qualities of the desire realm.

original: de la bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections dedicated to the meditative absorptions?

original: sbyin pas byin gyis brlabs pas gang dang gang du 'dod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pas byin gyis brlabs pas gang dang gang du 'dod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity dedicated to the meditative absorptions is the generosity that blesses whatever is desired.

original: sems dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩchos kyi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid du brtags pa'i @70a *//
analyzed: sems dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // chos kyi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid du brtags pa'i @70a *//
translated: The perfection of moral discipline dedicated to the meditative absorptions is the moral discipline of one who is mentally composed.

original: bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience dedicated to the meditative absorptions is the patience of one who has contemplated the sameness of the nature of phenomena.

original: sems kyi kun nas dkris pa rnam par sel ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi kun nas dkris pa rnam par sel ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort dedicated to the meditative absorptions is the effort of one who eliminates the fetters of the mind.

original: thos pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩ'dod chags rab tu zhi ba'i shes rab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thos pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'dod chags rab tu zhi ba'i shes rab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The concentration of the wisdom of the one who is devoted to learning is the perfection of concentration of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The concentration of the wisdom of the pacification of desire is the perfection of wisdom of concentration.

original: 'di dag ni bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of concentration.

original: de la mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of superknowledge?

original: mar me phul ba'i rnam par smin pa lha'i mig 'grub par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mar me phul ba'i rnam par smin pa lha'i mig 'grub par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of superknowledge is the maturation of the offering of lamps that results in the divine eye.

original: lha'i rna ba 'grub par 'gyur ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba 'grub par 'gyur ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of superknowledge is the perfection of morality that results in the divine ear.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa 'grub par byed pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa 'grub par byed pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who is patient through the non-dual wisdom which accomplishes the recollection of former abodes is the perfection of patience of the superknowledges.

original: sems can la dmigs shing 'jig rten pa'i dge @70b ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs shing 'jig rten pa'i dge @70b ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of vigor of one who accomplishes the roots of wholesomeness of the mundane sphere, focusing on sentient beings, is the perfection of vigor of the superknowledges.

original: rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa dang / 'gog par shes pa rgyas par byed pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa dang / 'gog par shes pa rgyas par byed pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who has the meditative concentration which accomplishes the supernormal knowledge of magical powers, which expands the knowledge of cessation, and which holds meditative absorption is the perfection of meditation of the superknowledges.

original: de las byung ba sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of the superknowledges is the wisdom that comes from the superknowledge of the cognition of the categories of mind, the superknowledge of the extinction of the outflows, and the wisdom that comes from the concentration of cessation.

original: 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
translated: These are called the six perfections of the superknowledges.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the worldly crafts?

original: 'di ltar bzo gzhan de dag gi nang nas 'jig rten pa'i bzo legs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bzo gzhan de dag gi nang nas 'jig rten pa'i bzo legs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of that giving is that among those other crafts, the worldly craft becomes excellent.

original: skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of morality is that it becomes pleasing to many people.

original: bzo thams cad la ma lus par shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: bzo thams cad la ma lus par shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of patience is that one knows all crafts without exception.

original: myur bar mngon du byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: myur bar mngon du byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The swiftness with which they appear is the karmic maturation of effort.

original: yid bzhin du 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //üîΩmi 'khor bar @71a *//
analyzed: yid bzhin du 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o // mi 'khor bar @71a *//
translated: The accomplishment of one‚Äôs wishes is the karmic maturation of meditative absorption.

original: shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The knowledge that they are not cyclic existence is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of worldly craftsmanship.

original: de la byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections dedicated with love?

original: sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sems kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i don du sems kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The generosity of the mind that is dedicated to the protection of all sentient beings is the perfection of generosity dedicated with love.

original: dper na ri bong bdag nyid gtong ba ni nga zo la 'dir 'dug cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na ri bong bdag nyid gtong ba ni nga zo la 'dir 'dug cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the rabbit who gave his own body, saying, ‚ÄúEat me and stay here.‚Äù

original: snyigs ma'i dus kyi tshe smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba byas nas sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul 'khrims kyi pha
analyzed: snyigs ma'i dus kyi tshe smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba byas nas sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul 'khrims kyi pha
translated: When the age of degeneration arrives, they take birth through the power of aspiration and cause sentient beings to adopt and to be established in the path of the ten virtues.üîΩüîΩThis is the morality of those who have dedicated their virtue to beings with love.

original: rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩdper na sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dang / ne tso'i skyes ba'i rabs lta bu'o /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa ste / dper na sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dang / ne tso'i skyes ba'i rabs lta bu'o /
translated: The perfection of morality dedicated by love is the morality of one who, by the power of his vow, takes birth in the degenerate age and causes beings to take up and to be established in the path of the ten virtues.

original: dus shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩdper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po mgo bcad kyang sems mi 'khrugs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dus shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste / dper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po mgo bcad kyang sems mi 'khrugs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of patience dedicated by love is the patience of one who, in the face of the suffering of birth, aging, sickness, and death, and the suffering of being killed, bound, beaten, and abused, does not lose his love for beings.

original: skye bo mang po mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: skye bo mang po mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of effort dedicated by love is the effort of one who, knowing the time, causes many beings to go to the higher realms.

original: dper na / @71b bram ze'i bu kun tu bzang dang / kun tu rgyu bla can gnyis brnyas pa bzod pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na / @71b bram ze'i bu kun tu bzang dang / kun tu rgyu bla can gnyis brnyas pa bzod pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, the Brahmin boy Samantaprabha and the mendicant Ugradatta both forgave insults.

original: da ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: da ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Now, the perfection of vigor dedicated by means of loving-kindness.

original: tshad med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩskye bo mang po rnam par smin par bya ba'i phyir dper na skyed pa po dang / sman chen gyis rgyal po'i gyos po tshar bcad kyang rnam par mtho brtsams pa'ang med la /
analyzed: tshad med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // skye bo mang po rnam par smin par bya ba'i phyir dper na skyed pa po dang / sman chen gyis rgyal po'i gyos po tshar bcad kyang rnam par mtho brtsams pa'ang med la /
translated: The perfection of meditation dedicated by means of loving-kindness is the meditation that accomplishes the immeasurables.

original: chu bor yang ma zhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chu bor yang ma zhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom dedicated by means of loving-kindness is the perfection of wisdom of one who has not entered the stream, for example, the one who destroyed the king's father-in-law, and the great physician, and who did not have any pride.

original: 'di dag ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections dedicated by means of loving-kindness.

original: de la snying rjes yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snying rjes yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that are dedicated with compassion?

original: sems can bde bar bya ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can bde bar bya ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that arises from compassion is the generosity of one who has the thought to bring happiness to sentient beings.

original: kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam gyis bdag kyang nyams pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam gyis bdag kyang nyams pa med pa yin la /
translated: The perfection of morality that arises from compassion is the moral practice of one who is not defiled by even the slightest wrongdoing,üîΩand who teaches others non-production.üîΩThe perfection of patience that arises from compassion is the patience of one who is tolerant of the faults of others,

original: skye ba med pas gzhan la'ang rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩtshig ngan brjod pa dag bdag dang du len pa'i rigs can yang yin la /
analyzed: skye ba med pas gzhan la'ang rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshig ngan brjod pa dag bdag dang du len pa'i rigs can yang yin la /
translated: and who encourages others to be patient.üîΩThe perfection of effort that arises from compassion is the effort of one who is not discouraged by the suffering of others,üîΩand who encourages others to make an effort.üîΩThe perfection of meditation that arises from compassion is the meditation of one who is not attached to the meditative absorptions,

original: gzhan la'ang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu @72a *//
analyzed: gzhan la'ang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu @72a *//
translated: and who encourages others to meditate.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom that arises from compassion is the wisdom of one who is not attached to the world,üîΩand who encourages others to be wise.

original: phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus brtsams pas yongs su skyo ba med par dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang / sems can mang po sgrol ba dang / sems can rnams nges par 'byin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus brtsams pas yongs su skyo ba med par dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang / sems can mang po sgrol ba dang / sems can rnams nges par 'byin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that arises from compassion is the effort to seek virtuous qualities without getting discouraged by undertaking effort, and the effort to engage many beings and to lead beings to deliverance.

original: ngan song gis yid byung ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ngan song gis yid byung ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation that arises from compassion is the meditation that delights those who are disgusted with the lower realms.

original: ngan song rnam par spyod pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / sems can yongs smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: ngan song rnam par spyod pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / sems can yongs smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
