original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa mi ldog pa ni /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa mi ldog pa ni /
translated: The non-returning maturation of the generosity of complete nirvana

original: dper na rgyal rigs kyis chu bo gangg'ar de la sogs pa'i sbyin pa'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal rigs kyis chu bo gangg'ar de la sogs pa'i sbyin pa'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: is like the generosity of the king of the k·π£atriyas who gave to the Ganges River and so forth.

original: btang snyoms yongs su bzung zhing phyir mi ldog pa zag pa zad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: btang snyoms yongs su bzung zhing phyir mi ldog pa zag pa zad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of the non-returning, fully embraced equanimity of the exhaustion of defilements is morality.

original: byang chub thob pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub thob pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience that is the attainment of enlightenment is patience.

original: lus kyi 'du byed 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is the rejection of the activities of the body is effort.

original: chos la btang snyoms las rab tu phye bas byang chub kyi snying por skyo ba med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: chos la btang snyoms las rab tu phye bas byang chub kyi snying por skyo ba med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that is the absence of weariness in the seat of enlightenment due to the differentiation of the equanimity of the Dharma is concentration.

original: byang chub kyi ye shes ston pas shes rab kyis rab tu bzung ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi ye shes ston pas shes rab kyis rab tu bzung ba ni /
translated: The wisdom that is the support of wisdom by the teaching of the wisdom of enlightenment

original: dper na bram ba'i bu byis pa dper brjod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: dper na bram ba'i bu byis pa dper brjod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: is like the example of the child of the brahman, which is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are without maturation.

original: de la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that are without delight?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sbyin pa ni /
translated: The generosity of nirvana

original: dper na dga' ba'i sngon gyi tshul las shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na dga' ba'i sngon gyi tshul las shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: is like the example of the previous conduct of Nanda, which is generosity.

original: 'dus byas kyis yid byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can gyi tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyis yid byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can gyi tshul khrims ni /
translated: The morality of one who is disgusted with the compounded and has the intention of nirvana isüîΩ

original: dper @86a *// na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la spyod pa'i sngon gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //üîΩchags pa med pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: dper @86a *// na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la spyod pa'i sngon gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so // chags pa med pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The morality of one who is disgusted with the conditioned and who has the intention of attaining nirvana is like that of the bodhisattva who practices effort.

original: dper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po mgo bcad kyang 'khrug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: dper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po mgo bcad kyang 'khrug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of one who is free of attachment is like that of the king of Kashi who, when his head was cut off, did not become angry.

original: ser skya'i gnas nas byung ste bsod snyoms len pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: ser skya'i gnas nas byung ste bsod snyoms len pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort of one who has gone forth from Kapilavastu and who takes alms is like that of the bodhisattva who practices effort.

original: tshangs par spyod cing yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa spu zing zhes byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //üîΩgrong khyer dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: tshangs par spyod cing yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa spu zing zhes byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no // grong khyer dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab ni /
translated: The concentration of one who is celibate and who possesses the four limbs, and whose hair stands on end, is like that of the bodhisattva who practices concentration.

original: dper ni 'jig rten pa ma lus pa thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: dper ni 'jig rten pa ma lus pa thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that is like a city is like that of the bodhisattva who practices wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the absence of delight.

original: de la dus su sbyin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dus su sbyin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections similar to timely giving?

original: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: Giving to those who are suffering is generosity.

original: rus sbal gyi skyes pa'i rabs kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: rus sbal gyi skyes pa'i rabs kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of the tortoise birth story is morality.

original: mngon du sdug bsngal bas lus dang ngag la gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa ni dper na bzangs brtsams yan lag bcad kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du sdug bsngal bas lus dang ngag la gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa ni dper na bzangs brtsams yan lag bcad kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of not harming body and speech through manifest suffering is, for example, the patience of not being disturbed when the limbs of Bhadra were cut off.

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba na brtson pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba na brtson pa ni /
translated: The effort of the appearance of the Buddha is effort.

original: dper na sangs rgyas @86b mngon sum du byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la lo sum khri'i bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: dper na sangs rgyas @86b mngon sum du byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la lo sum khri'i bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: For example, diligence is the diligence of the bodhisattva who, in the presence of the Buddha, for thirty thousand years, did not experience sleepiness or dullness in the ocean of the samadhis of the Tathagata.

original: btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: Concentration is the concentration of the bodhisattva who, while dwelling in the harem,

original: 'khor ba na gang dus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab gang dang gang du bdag dang gzhal phan par 'gyur ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba na gang dus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab gang dang gang du bdag dang gzhal phan par 'gyur ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom of the bodhisattva who, in samsara, is endowed with the wisdom that is timely and beneficial for self and others.

original: 'di dag ni dus su sbyin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dus su sbyin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas that are endowed with timely giving.

original: de la 'od kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of light?

original: mar me'i phreng ba sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o /
analyzed: mar me'i phreng ba sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o /
translated: Giving is the giving of a garland of lamps.

original: gzhan la phan pa'i tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa'i tshul khrims ni /
translated: Morality is the morality of benefiting others.

original: dper na sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dper na sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: This morality is like that of the Jataka of the Partriarch Baka.

original: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: This patience is the patience of the certainty of Dharma.

original: 'bru mar gyi sbyin pa la brtson pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: 'bru mar gyi sbyin pa la brtson pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: This effort is the effort of one who is intent on giving oil.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa dang po pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa dang po pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: This meditation is the meditation of the Bodhisattva in the first eon.

original: chos la bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: chos la bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i shes rab ni /
translated: This wisdom is the wisdom of one who has emerged from the patience of the Dharma.

original: dper na bram ze'i bu sprin gyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i bu sprin gyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: This wisdom is like that of the Brahman boy Megha.

original: 'di dag ni 'od kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'od kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of light.

original: de la 'od mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of infinite light?

original: thabs la mkhas @87a *//
analyzed: thabs la mkhas @87a *//
translated: This giving is the giving of skill in means.

original: pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi rnam par smin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'gengs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //üîΩmi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi rnam par smin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'gengs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o // mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: That generosity by means of which, as a ripened effect, one fills the infinite buddha-fields with the light of the Buddha, is generosity.üîΩThat morality by means of which, having attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, one dedicates to the perfection of wisdom, is morality.

original: chos la 'du shes pa'i bzod pa yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: chos la 'du shes pa'i bzod pa yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: That patience by means of which, having attained the acceptance of dharmas, one dedicates to the perfection of wisdom, is patience.

original: stong pa nyid la sgom par dga' ba'i brtson 'grus yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sgom par dga' ba'i brtson 'grus yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: That effort by means of which, delighting in the meditation on emptiness, one dedicates to the perfection of wisdom, is effort.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: That meditation by means of which, having attained the irreversible dhyanas, one dedicates to the perfection of wisdom, is meditation.

original: sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i shes rab thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste; 'di dag ni 'od mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i shes rab thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste; 'di dag ni 'od mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: That wisdom by means of which, having attained the eighth stage, one dedicates to the perfection of wisdom, is wisdom. These are the six perfections of infinite light.

original: de la rnam par smin pa bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the happiness of ripening?

analyzed: shi ba la thug pa'i sbyin pa gang gi rnam par smin pas dga' ldan nas shi 'phos pa na yi dvagas rnams kyi bkres pa phyid pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The giving that is the cause of the happiness of rebirth in Tu·π£ita Heaven is the giving that, through its ripening, causes the hungry ghosts to be satisfied with food and drink when they die and transmigrate from Tu·π£ita Heaven.

original: shi ba la thug pa rnams bcings pa las dgrol ba'i phyir bdag nyid gtong ba'i tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: shi ba la thug pa rnams bcings pa las dgrol ba'i phyir bdag nyid gtong ba'i tshul khrims ni /
translated: The morality of giving oneself for the sake of freeing those who are bound, even at the cost of one‚Äôs life,

original: dper na rgyal po'i bu legs byin gyi sngon gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i bu legs byin gyi sngon gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: is like the morality of Prince SupƒÅraga in a previous life.

analyzed: bzod pa ni @87b dper na nya'i skyes pa'i rabs las grog sbur de dag gis bdag gi sha zas nas bde bar gyur na legs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of thinking, ‚ÄúIt is good that those ants are eating my flesh,‚Äù as in the JƒÅtaka of the Fish, is patience.

original: rta'i rgyal po rdog ldan sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir brtson pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: rta'i rgyal po rdog ldan sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir brtson pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort of the king of horses, BƒÅlƒÅha, in his efforts out of compassion for those who are suffering is effort.

original: nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa'i bsam gtan ni /
analyzed: nad kyi bar gyi bskal pa'i bsam gtan ni /
translated: The concentration of the intermediate eon of sickness is

original: dper na bram ze'i bu de bi dha dzambu'i gling du reg pa lnga zhi bar byed pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i bu de bi dha dzambu'i gling du reg pa lnga zhi bar byed pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: like the concentration of the brahman youth Devadatta, who pacified the five contacts in Jambudvipa.

original: tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i sras mo bu mo lnga brgya dag thar par byas pa dang / srin mo bye ba phrag lnga mir byas pa'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i sras mo bu mo lnga brgya dag thar par byas pa dang / srin mo bye ba phrag lnga mir byas pa'i shes rab ni /

analyzed: ded dpon gyi sngon gyi tshul las shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections whose fruition is happiness.

analyzed: de la phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of irreversibility?

analyzed: mi lta ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is the morality of one who does not look at things.üîΩPatience is the patience of one who is not by nature impatient.

analyzed: rig pa skyes pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no // mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i shes @88a *//

original: rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /

original: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: sa brgyad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of joy.

analyzed: de la rnam par dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of purity?

translated: Generosity is the generosity of nonattachment.

original: shin tu sbyangs ba byang chub kyi yan lag sgrub pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs ba byang chub kyi yan lag sgrub pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so /
translated: The morality that is the means of accomplishing the limb of enlightenment of pliancy is morality.

original: @88b / lus la mi lta ba dang / srog la mi lta ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: @88b / lus la mi lta ba dang / srog la mi lta ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience that is not concerned with the body and not concerned with life is patience.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is associated with the limb of enlightenment of the investigation of phenomena is effort.

original: rtog pa med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The meditation that is free of conceptualization is meditation.

original: byang chub sgrub pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: byang chub sgrub pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that is the means of accomplishing enlightenment is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of purification.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i chos las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i chos las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that transcend worldly dharmas?

original: rnam par smin pa 'dus ma byas dang / lam bde ba sgrub pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa 'dus ma byas dang / lam bde ba sgrub pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The giving that is the means of accomplishing the unconditioned ripening and the pleasant path is giving.

original: lam la zhugs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: lam la zhugs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is the morality of one who has entered the path.

original: byang chub la the tsom med pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub la the tsom med pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Patience is the patience of one who has no doubts about enlightenment.

original: mthong ba'i chos la bde ba sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos la bde ba sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: Effort is the effort of one who accomplishes the happiness of the present life.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //üîΩdran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su sbyang ba byas shing /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su sbyang ba byas shing /
translated: Meditation is the meditation that is associated with the attainment of cessation.üîΩWisdom is the wisdom of one who has purified the applications of mindfulness

original: bden pa yongs su gzung ba bya ba byas pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: bden pa yongs su gzung ba bya ba byas pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: and who has taken up the truths.

original: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that transcend the mundane.

original: de la skye ba bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩskyes pa tsam @89a *//
analyzed: de la skye ba bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / skyes pa tsam @89a *//
translated: What are the six perfections of the arrangement of birth?üîΩGenerosity is the generosity of one who, as soon as he is born,

original: gyis stong gsum du sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gyis stong gsum du sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: gives gifts in the trichiliocosm.

original: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad bde bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad bde bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is that by which all beings become happy just by being born.

original: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can gnod sems can rnams gnod pa mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can gnod sems can rnams gnod pa mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Patience is that by which beings who are hostile just by being born do not do harm.

original: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can stong phrag rnams mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson pa ni /
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can stong phrag rnams mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson pa ni /
translated: Effort is that by which thousands of beings are established in nirvana just by being born.

original: dper na 'od srung dang por rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: dper na 'od srung dang por rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: For example, Kasyapa, the first going forth is effort.

original: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can rnams dran pa thob pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can rnams dran pa thob pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: Meditation is that by which beings attain mindfulness just by being born.

original: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal bar gyur pa chos brjod pa rnams tha na kun tu brjod cing mngon par brjod pa'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal bar gyur pa chos brjod pa rnams tha na kun tu brjod cing mngon par brjod pa'i shes rab ste /
translated: Wisdom is that by which beings who have become hell beings proclaim and express the Dharma, even if only in words.

original: 'di dag ni skye ba bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni skye ba bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the arrangement of birth.

original: de la rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the perfection of lineage?

original: 'khor gyi longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The generosity that is the great enjoyment of the retinue is the generosity of the perfection of lineage.

original: 'khor kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'khor kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality that is the retinue without fault is the morality of the perfection of lineage.

original: 'khor gcig la gcig mngon par dga' ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gcig la gcig mngon par dga' ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience that is the mutual delight of the retinue is the patience of the perfection of lineage.

original: 'khor ma btang bar rang gi bya ba rnams la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson @89b 'grus so //
analyzed: 'khor ma btang bar rang gi bya ba rnams la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson @89b 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is the effort of one‚Äôs own actions without abandoning the retinue is the effort of the perfection of lineage.

original: legs par bsam pa sems shing 'khor dul ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: legs par bsam pa sems shing 'khor dul ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that is the concentration of the retinue that is well contemplated is the concentration of the perfection of lineage.

original: 'khor thams cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'khor thams cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The wisdom that is the wisdom of the entire retinue is the wisdom of the perfection of lineage.

original: shes rab ste; 'di dag ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: shes rab ste; 'di dag ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the perfection of lineage.

original: de la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that accomplish the excellent retinue?

original: 'dus pa chen po dag la lo lnga'i bar du yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //üîΩskye bo mang po'i 'byor ba skyo ba med pa'i tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po dag la lo lnga'i bar du yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o // skye bo mang po'i 'byor ba skyo ba med pa'i tshul khrims ni /
translated: The generosity that causes the great assembly to take up the true Dharma for five years is the generosity of the bodhisattva.

original: dper na kun tu rgyu rtogs byed kyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //üîΩsems can mang po'i phyir bzod pa ni /üîΩdper na nor lnga bre gang gi phyir rgya mtsho chen por chu srin ma ka ra'i khar zhugs pa dang / yang dper na /
analyzed: dper na kun tu rgyu rtogs byed kyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so // sems can mang po'i phyir bzod pa ni / dper na nor lnga bre gang gi phyir rgya mtsho chen por chu srin ma ka ra'i khar zhugs pa dang / yang dper na /
translated: The morality of not being discouraged by the wealth of many beings is like that of the wandering ascetic UdƒÅyin.

original: nor lnga bre gang gi phyir khron par song ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nor lnga bre gang gi phyir khron par song ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience for the sake of many beings is like that of entering the mouth of the sea monster Timitimi·πÖgila in the great ocean for the sake of five measures of wealth, or like going into a pit for five measures of wealth.

original: skye bo mang po la bskyab pa'i phyir brtson pa ni /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la bskyab pa'i phyir brtson pa ni /
translated: The effort to protect many beings is like that of the bodhisattva who was born as a hare.

original: dper na nor bu'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po skam par brtsams pa gang yin pa de lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na nor bu'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po skam par brtsams pa gang yin pa de lta bu ste /
translated: It is like the one who, for the sake of a jewel, set out to drain the great ocean.

original: de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: This is perseverance.

original: mu stegs byed rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bsam gtan sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: mu stegs byed rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bsam gtan sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration of the tƒ´rthika Cakra, which is endowed with benefit for sentient beings, is concentration.

original: skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa'i shes rab ni /
translated: The wisdom that is dedicated to the benefit of many beings isüîΩlike the one who, for the sake of five hundred deer

original: dper na ri dvagas kyi rgyal po blo bzang gyis ri dvagas lnga brgya rgyar chud pa @90a *//
analyzed: dper na ri dvagas kyi rgyal po blo bzang gyis ri dvagas lnga brgya rgyar chud pa @90a *//
translated: who had fallen into a trap, gave up his own life and was reborn as the king of beasts, the lion.üîΩThe wisdom that is dedicated to the benefit of many beings is

original: pa rnams gzhan ri bong dang lhan cig tu thar par byas nas 'bros su btang ba dang / dzambu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la bkod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: pa rnams gzhan ri bong dang lhan cig tu thar par byas nas 'bros su btang ba dang / dzambu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la bkod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: like the one who, for the sake of five hundred deer who had fallen into a trap, gave up his own life and was reborn as the king of beasts, the lion.

original: 'di dag ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the perfect retinue.

original: de la 'khor mi phyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor mi phyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections for achieving an undivided retinue?

original: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The generosity that is the abandonment of divisive speech is the generosity.

original: byams pa la dmigs pa thogs pa med pa'i sems kyi tshul khrims kyi go bgos pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: byams pa la dmigs pa thogs pa med pa'i sems kyi tshul khrims kyi go bgos pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The armor of morality of the unimpeded mind that focuses on love is the morality.

original: sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of an equal mind is the patience.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zang zing med pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zang zing med pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is the uncontaminated effort for the sake of ripening sentient beings is the effort.

original: gzungs rab tu thob pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: gzungs rab tu thob pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that is the attainment of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s is the concentration.

original: rnam par grol bas yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol bas yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that is the liberation of the mind is the wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni 'khor mi phyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'khor mi phyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections for achieving an undivided retinue.

original: de la rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa bskyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa bskyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of accomplishing the generation of the purification of the fully ripened effect?

original: nad pa mgon med pa rnams la gsos sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: nad pa mgon med pa rnams la gsos sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: Giving medicine to the sick and the unprotected is the perfection of generosity.

original: sdug bsngal @90b gyis nyam thag pa rnams yongs su skyob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal @90b gyis nyam thag pa rnams yongs su skyob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Protecting those who are afflicted by suffering is morality.

original: bla mas spyo ba bzod cing mi khro ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: bla mas spyo ba bzod cing mi khro ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Being patient and not angry when scolded by a guru is patience.

original: mngal na kun tu rmongs pa gso bar byed pa dang / bstan pa las mngon par 'phags pa rnams la ston pa dang / dge slong ma rnams la rjes su srung ba'i brtson 'gros gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: mngal na kun tu rmongs pa gso bar byed pa dang / bstan pa las mngon par 'phags pa rnams la ston pa dang / dge slong ma rnams la rjes su srung ba'i brtson 'gros gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort to heal confusion in the womb, to teach those who are superior to the teachings, and to protect the nuns is effort.

original: gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that serves one‚Äôs mother for the sake of benefiting others is concentration.

original: skye ba mang po'i 'gyod pa sel ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: skye ba mang po'i 'gyod pa sel ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that removes the regret of many lifetimes is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa bskyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa bskyed pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of accomplishing the generation of the completely pure ripening.

original: de la phyogs rnam par lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyogs rnam par lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of looking in all directions?

original: thogs pa med par mig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med par mig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The giving of eyes without obstruction is the giving.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i sems kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i sems kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of an unobstructed mind is the morality.

original: bsam pa nges pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa nges pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of a definite intention is the patience.

original: skyo ba med pa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: skyo ba med pa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort of accomplishing the unaccomplished superknowledges without weariness is the effort.

analyzed: lha'i mig gi phyir yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //

original: sgra dang brda rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: sgra dang brda rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that causes the understanding of sounds and signs is the wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni phyogs rnam par lta ba'i @91a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyogs rnam par lta ba'i @91a *//
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of looking in all directions.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of proclaiming complete understanding.

original: de la yongs su shes pa sgrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs su shes pa sgrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of proclaiming complete understanding?

original: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa sems can rnams la yongs su bsngos shing /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa sems can rnams la yongs su bsngos shing /
translated: The giving of dedicating the ripening of generosity to sentient beings

original: gzhan la phan pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: and the ripening of benefiting others is generosity.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang bral ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang bral ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of being free from the connection of traces is morality.

original: snying rje med pa ma yin pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje med pa ma yin pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //

original: zil gyis non pa med pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: zil gyis non pa med pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is not overcome is effort.

original: chad med pas yongs su bzung ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: chad med pas yongs su bzung ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /

original: 'di dag ni yongs su shes pa sgrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yongs su shes pa sgrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of proclaiming complete understanding.

original: de la bag yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩbyang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: de la bag yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni /
translated: What are the six perfections of conscientiousness?üîΩGiving is, for example, the giving that is dedicated to enlightenment,

original: dper na blon po sa ga'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //üîΩgnad bcad pa la gnas kyang las la rton pa'i tshul khrims ni /
analyzed: dper na blon po sa ga'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o // gnad bcad pa la gnas kyang las la rton pa'i tshul khrims ni /
translated: like the minister SƒÅgata.üîΩMorality is, for example, the morality of relying on action while abiding in the vital points,

original: dper na rngon pa dpa' rtogs kyis sengge'i gnad du bsnun pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dper na rngon pa dpa' rtogs kyis sengge'i gnad du bsnun pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: like the brave hunter‚Äôs striking the lion‚Äôs vital points.

original: legs par gsungs pa'i don du me'i phung por mchongs pa'i bzod pa gang yin @91b pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i don du me'i phung por mchongs pa'i bzod pa gang yin @91b pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Patience is the patience of jumping into a fire for the sake of the well-spoken teachings.

original: 'dus byas la 'bar bar mthong zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can gyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: 'dus byas la 'bar bar mthong zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can gyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: Effort is the effort of one who sees conditioned things as burning and has the intention of attaining nirvana.

original: rgyal srid thams cad spangs te gcig bur ri la nyon mongs pa can ma yin par gnas shing grags pa dang 'khor mang por ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rgyal srid thams cad spangs te gcig bur ri la nyon mongs pa can ma yin par gnas shing grags pa dang 'khor mang por ldan pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: Meditation is the meditation of one who has renounced the kingdom, who dwells alone in the mountains, who is not defiled, who has fame and a great retinue.

original: ro myang ba med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ro myang ba med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom of one who has no taste for the pleasures of the senses.

original: dper na rgyal po'i bu mnyam sems kyis rgyal srid btang nas kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las ji snyed pa dag gang yin snyam nas dri ma dang bral bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i bu mnyam sems kyis rgyal srid btang nas kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las ji snyed pa dag gang yin snyam nas dri ma dang bral bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: For example, when Prince Samacittta renounced the kingdom, he thought, ‚ÄúWhat are the actions that are without fault?‚Äù and he became free of defilements.

original: 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of heedfulness.

original: de la rdzi ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdzi ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being unassailable?

original: len pa mang po rnams la thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: len pa mang po rnams la thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: Giving is the giving with an unimpeded mind to many who are taking.

original: g-yo med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: g-yo med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is the morality of one who is without deceit.

original: bsgoms pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience that arises from meditation is patience.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is based on the sameness of all things is effort.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that is irreversible is concentration.

original: chos thams cad rnam par 'jog pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /üîΩ'di dag ni rdzi ba med pa'i pha rol tu @92a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par 'jog pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste / 'di dag ni rdzi ba med pa'i pha rol tu @92a *//
translated: The wisdom that is based on the establishment of all things is wisdom.

original: phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas that are unassailable.

original: de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of nirvana?

original: yi dvagas kyi 'jig rten la dmigs shing gang sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: yi dvagas kyi 'jig rten la dmigs shing gang sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The giving that is the giving of one who, seeing the suffering of beings, focuses on the world of hungry ghosts is giving.

original: dud 'gro'i gnas su phyin nas sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na yid byung ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i gnas su phyin nas sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na yid byung ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality that is the morality of one who, having gone to the realm of animals, is disgusted by the suffering of beings is morality.

original: dmigs pa med pa thos pa dang / reg par dka' ba mthong na bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa thos pa dang / reg par dka' ba mthong na bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Patience is the patience of one who has heard and touched the unattainable.

original: log pa spong ba'i rab tu dbye ba la yid byung ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
analyzed: log pa spong ba'i rab tu dbye ba la yid byung ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
translated: Diligence is the diligence of one who is disgusted with the wrong path.

original: dper na kun las bud med spangs pa lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na kun las bud med spangs pa lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: For example, it is like the diligence of one who has renounced women.

original: thar pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan ni /
analyzed: thar pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan ni /
translated: Meditation is the meditation of one who is focused on liberation.

original: dper na shing dzambu'i grib ma lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: dper na shing dzambu'i grib ma lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: For example, it is like the meditation of one who is in the shade of the Jambu tree.

original: 'khor ba'i skyon rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab ni /
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom of one who pacifies the faults of cyclic existence.

original: dper na rgyal po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir khyim nas byung ba dang / dper na spu zing zhes byed pa'i shes rab yongs su dkar ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: dper na rgyal po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir khyim nas byung ba dang / dper na spu zing zhes byed pa'i shes rab yongs su dkar ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: For example, it is like the wisdom of one who goes forth from home to homelessness like a king, or like the wisdom of one who is completely white like a goose.

original: 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: de la dbang che bar grags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang che bar grags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of great power?

original: snying rje med pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje med pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The generosity that is not without compassion is generosity.üîΩThe morality that is not with excessive pride is morality.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims @92b so; ;ma zhum pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims @92b so; ;ma zhum pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience that is not with discouragement is patience.

original: bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort that is with service to the guru is effort.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam gtan ni /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam gtan ni /
translated: The concentration that is with the thought of ripening sentient beings

original: dper na rgyal po'i bu me tog lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i bu me tog lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: is like the concentration of Prince KusumƒÅkara.

original: rab tu byung ba gang gi yan lag dang nying lag gtubs kyang nam yang nyams par ma gyur ba'i shes rab don dam pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba gang gi yan lag dang nying lag gtubs kyang nam yang nyams par ma gyur ba'i shes rab don dam pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that is with ultimate truth is the wisdom of one who, even though his major and minor limbs are cut off, never loses his mind.

original: 'di dag ni dbang che bar grags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dbang che bar grags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of being renowned for great power.

original: de la bskul ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bskul ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of urging?

original: gang len du 'jug cing spros pa dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang len du 'jug cing spros pa dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The generosity of one who gives with elaboration, and who gives after having taken away from others, is generosity.

original: phan pa'i dngos po dang ldan zhing legs par sbyin pa bskul ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: phan pa'i dngos po dang ldan zhing legs par sbyin pa bskul ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of one who is endowed with the means of benefitting others, and who gives the gift of urging others to virtue, is morality.

original: dul ba'i gnas su gdams ngag rjes su ston pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: dul ba'i gnas su gdams ngag rjes su ston pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: The patience of one who gives instruction in the state of self-discipline, is patience.

original: chos mnyan pa dang bsgrags pa la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa dang bsgrags pa la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort of one who is intent on listening to the Dharma and on proclaiming it, is effort.

original: sems can yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i bsam gtan ni /
analyzed: sems can yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i bsam gtan ni /
translated: The concentration of one who causes sentient beings to take up the true teaching is

original: dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mig bzang kyi lta bu gang yin pa'o //üîΩthe tsom can gyi the tsom gcod cing dor bar 'dong pa rnams la chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su srung la rab tu 'jog pa btang snyoms @93a *//
analyzed: dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mig bzang kyi lta bu gang yin pa'o // the tsom can gyi the tsom gcod cing dor bar 'dong pa rnams la chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su srung la rab tu 'jog pa btang snyoms @93a *//
translated: like that of the universal monarch who has the jewel of a queen.

original: can gyi shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: can gyi shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom of one who is equanimous, who protects and establishes those who are doubtful by cutting through their doubts and by teaching them the Dharma, is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni bskul ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bskul ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of urging.

original: de la brjed nges pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brjed nges pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of not forgetting?

original: kha ton dang ldan pa rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: kha ton dang ldan pa rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The giving of those who have the oral tradition is generosity.

original: dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa thob pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa thob pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of attaining indivisibility with the Three Jewels is morality.

original: thos pa'i phyir bzod cing lus kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa ni /
analyzed: thos pa'i phyir bzod cing lus kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa ni /
translated: The patience of being tolerant of hearing and of enduring physical suffering

original: dper na bgo ba nges pa'i yan lag bcad pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: dper na bgo ba nges pa'i yan lag bcad pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o //
translated: is, for example, like the patience of the one who cut off his own limbs to give to others.

original: man ngag dang kha ton bya ba'i brtson 'grus gzhan la rjes su srung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson /
analyzed: man ngag dang kha ton bya ba'i brtson 'grus gzhan la rjes su srung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson /
translated: The effort of protecting others through the effort of instruction and oral tradition is effort.

original: 'grus so // bsam gtan pas dus su yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: 'grus so // bsam gtan pas dus su yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration of the one who is concentrated in taking up the right time is concentration.

original: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi rtog pa'i spyod lam la gnas nas chos sbyin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi rtog pa'i spyod lam la gnas nas chos sbyin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom that is the giving of the Dharma through remaining in a way of life that is free of thoughts of gain and honor is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni brjed ngas pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brjed ngas pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being without forgetfulness.

original: de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of having very steady feet?

original: zhabs sa la 'jog pa na snyoms pa dang / 'degs pa na snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs sa la 'jog pa na snyoms pa dang / 'degs pa na snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that when one places one‚Äôs feet on the ground, they are level, and when one lifts them up, they are level.

original: bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de @93b ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de @93b ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that one remains in comfort.

original: gzhan gyis nyams par byar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis nyams par byar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that one cannot be harmed by others.

original: 'khrul pa med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o /
translated: The maturation of this effort is that one remains without error.

original: zhabs reg pas sems can bde bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs reg pas sems can bde bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that sentient beings become happy through the contact of one‚Äôs feet.

original: go chas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: go chas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one is born as one wishes.

original: 'di dag ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the feet being well-placed.

original: de la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of accomplishing the wheel with a thousand spokes?

original: 'khor los spras pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor los spras pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that one accomplishes the wheel.

original: rtsibs phan tshun ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rtsibs phan tshun ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that the spokes are not mixed up.

original: 'dod chags kyi dbang gis mi gos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi dbang gis mi gos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that one is not tainted by the power of desire.

original: bum pa lta bu dang / bkra shis dang / g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa lta bu dang / bkra shis dang / g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that one is adorned with vases, auspiciousness, and swastikas.

original: 'khor lo'i 'od 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i 'od 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The radiance of the wheel is the karmic maturation of meditative stability.

original: 'od sna tshogs gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni 'khor lo rtsibs tong dang ldan pa sgrub par byed pa'i @94a *//
analyzed: 'od sna tshogs gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste / 'di dag ni 'khor lo rtsibs tong dang ldan pa sgrub par byed pa'i @94a *//
translated: The emission of various lights is the karmic maturation of wisdom.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that accomplish the wheel with a thousand spokes.

original: de la rnam par smin pa rting pa yangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa rting pa yangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs whose karmic maturation is broad heels?

original: rting pa yangs shing shin tu srab pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa yangs shing shin tu srab pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: Broad and thin heels are the karmic maturation of generosity.

original: rting pa yangs pa zlum zhing shin tu mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa yangs pa zlum zhing shin tu mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: Broad, round, and very firm heels are the karmic maturation of discipline.

original: rting pa yangs shing yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa yangs shing yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: Broad and perfect heels are the karmic maturation of patience.

original: rting pa yangs shing stabs legs par bzhud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa yangs shing stabs legs par bzhud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The feet are broad and well-placed: this is the ripened result of perseverance.

original: rting pa yangs shing mdog snum pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa yangs shing mdog snum pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The feet are broad and have a shiny color: this is the ripened result of meditative stability.

original: rting pa yangs shing legs par grub la mkhrang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: rting pa yangs shing legs par grub la mkhrang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The feet are broad, well-formed, and firm: this is the ripened result of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa rting pa yangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa rting pa yangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs whose ripened result is having broad heels.

original: de la rnam par smin pa zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs whose ripened result is having ankles that do not protrude?

original: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon shing shin tu mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon shing shin tu mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The ankles do not protrude and are very firm: this is the ripened result of generosity.

original: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa chu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o /
analyzed: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa chu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o /
translated: The ankles do not protrude and are moist: this is the ripened result of discipline.

analyzed: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon zhing 'jam la mdangs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i @94b rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon zhing mthon dman med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon zhing yangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: zhabs lo bu'i tshigs mi mngon zhing spa ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /

analyzed: kha @95b dog snang ba mthong na dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /

analyzed: gsang ba'i sbubs kha dog mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa spu re re'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: g-yas su 'khyil ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: phan tshun ma 'dzings shing mi 'greng ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa spu re re'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: gser mdog gser gyi kha dog can gang yin pa de ni @96b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: gser gyi mdog can 'od rgya che ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa gser gyi mdog can gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa sku ro stod sengge 'dra ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: sku rim par 'tsham pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The body that is well-proportioned is the karmic maturation of the perfection of giving.

analyzed: sku ro stod legs par 'brel ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: sku ro stod mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

original: sku ro stod blta na bzang ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: sku ro stod blta na bzang ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: sku ro stod shin tu yangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: smin pa sku ro stod sengge dra ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa bdun mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: bdun mtho ba yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

original: mtho ba bkra shis pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ba bkra shis pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //

original: mthong na yid dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: mthong na yid dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

original: mtho ba snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ba snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: mtho zhing ma zhum la mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: 'jam zhing snum la dang zhing gsal ba mtho ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The one that is smooth, shiny, clear, and high is the maturation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa bdun mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa bdun mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the seven high maturations.

original: de la rnam par smin pa phyag ring ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa phyag ring ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: bdag nyid rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
