translated: The effort is the one who, having gone forth, has given up the clothes of Kashi and taken up the Dharma robes.

original: thar pa la reg par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩyul ma ga dha'i bdag po yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer @103a *//
analyzed: thar pa la reg par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // yul ma ga dha'i bdag po yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer @103a *//
translated: The meditation is the one who has touched liberation.üîΩThe wisdom is the one who has gone to the city

original: du gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam smin pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni dus shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: du gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam smin pa ste / 'di dag ni dus shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: in order to ripen the lord of Magadha.üîΩThese are the six perfections of knowing the time.

original: de la rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of analysis?

original: thugs brtse ba'i slad du rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o; ;lha rnams la chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: thugs brtse ba'i slad du rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o; ;lha rnams la chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The fact that he taught the Dharma to the gods is the maturation of his morality.

original: rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas ri la bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas ri la bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The fact that he went to the royal capital and stayed in the mountains is the maturation of his patience.

original: sku drang por bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sku drang por bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The fact that he sat up straight is the maturation of his effort.

original: bsam gtan la dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan la dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The fact that he was intent on meditation is the maturation of his meditation.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The fact that he contemplated dependent origination is the maturation of his perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of analysis.

original: de la 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of acting in accordance with the world?

original: slong mo la gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam smin pa'o //
analyzed: slong mo la gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that he went forth to beg.

original: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dang rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad du gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dang rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad du gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that he went to the presence of ArƒÅ·∏ça KƒÅlƒÅma and Udraka RƒÅmaputra.

original: 'di ni lam ma yin no zhes spangs nas gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lam ma yin no zhes spangs nas gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that he went away, saying, ‚ÄúThis is not the path.‚Äù

original: lo @103b drug tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lo @103b drug tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that he stayed for six years.

original: mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that he meditated on the all-pervading.

original: mi spyod snyam nas zhal zas gsol te byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste //
analyzed: mi spyod snyam nas zhal zas gsol te byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste //
translated: The maturation of this perfection of wisdom is that, thinking, ‚ÄúI will not eat,‚Äù he ate some food and went to the seat of awakening.üîΩThese are the six perfections that accord with the world.

original: 'di dag ni 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go de la rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go de la rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of realization?

original: bdud 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: bdud 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that I subdue Mara.

original: stong gsum gyi sems can thams cad la bde bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi sems can thams cad la bde bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that I bring happiness to all the beings of the three-thousand-fold world system.

original: sems can thams cad la dmigs shing dam bcas pa mi 'dral ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la dmigs shing dam bcas pa mi 'dral ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that I am not broken by my vows, which are focused on all beings.

original: stong gsum la sgrib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: stong gsum la sgrib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that I am unobstructed in the three-thousand-fold world system.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that I enter into the four meditations.

original: rig pa gsum rjes su 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: rig pa gsum rjes su 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this perfection of wisdom is that I attain the three knowledges.

original: 'di dag ni rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of realization.

original: de la spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections of abandonment?

original: ser skya'i gnas na lor nye bar bsnyen pa gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ser skya'i gnas na lor nye bar bsnyen pa gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the one who, in the place of Kapila, is close to a year.

original: 'gog pa la brtson zhing khams gsum la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul @104a *//
analyzed: 'gog pa la brtson zhing khams gsum la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul @104a *//
translated: The perfection of morality is the one who, striving for cessation, does not abide in the three realms.

original: khrims kyi'o // mi skye ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: khrims kyi'o // mi skye ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the one who focuses on non-arising.

original: sems can la lta ba'i snying rje dang spyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can la lta ba'i snying rje dang spyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the one who has compassion that regards sentient beings and conduct.

original: skyon spong ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: skyon spong ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the one who abandons faults and is in accord with the factors of complete enlightenment.

original: yan lag brgyad rab tu thob cing ma spags la nag nog med pa'i tshul khrims can 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir dang / ma rig pa gzhom pa'i phyir rig pa bskyed cing chos thams cad la sgrib pa med la spong ba chen po gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad rab tu thob cing ma spags la nag nog med pa'i tshul khrims can 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir dang / ma rig pa gzhom pa'i phyir rig pa bskyed cing chos thams cad la sgrib pa med la spong ba chen po gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of elimination is the maturation of the perfection of morality that is endowed with the eight components, that is not violated, that is not sullied, that is not stained, that generates knowledge in order to abandon desire and to conquer ignorance, and that is the great abandonment that is unobstructed with regard to all phenomena.

original: 'di dag ni spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of elimination.

original: de la rdo rje lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six vajra-like perfections?

original: rdo je lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo je lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of generosity is the attainment of the vajra-like meditative stabilization that accomplishes the abandonment of all afflictive emotions.

original: dmigs pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of morality is the non-abandonment of the meditative stabilization.

original: phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of patience is the non-erroneous apprehension of the meditative stabilization.

original: thams cad du mthun par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du mthun par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of effort is the engagement in the meditative stabilization in all ways.

original: rang gi yon tan shes nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi yon tan shes nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this concentration is that, knowing one‚Äôs own qualities, one abandons the connections of habitual tendencies.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang shes pa ma lus par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa gang yin pa @104b de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang shes pa ma lus par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa gang yin pa @104b de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this perfection of wisdom is that one fully awakens to the thoughts and knowledge of all sentient beings without exception.

original: 'di dag ni rdo rje lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rdo rje lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that are like a vajra.

original: de la mun pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mun pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that are without darkness?

original: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa na gang dag lha rnams 'jig rten gyi mgon po rgyal bar gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa na gang dag lha rnams 'jig rten gyi mgon po rgyal bar gyur cig /
translated: When one fully awakens to perfect buddhahood, the gods proclaim, ‚ÄúThe protector of the world has become victorious!

original: rgyal bar gyur cig /
analyzed: rgyal bar gyur cig /
translated: He has become victorious!‚Äù

original: ces brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: ces brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this perfection of generosity is that one becomes a protector of the world.

original: ngan song rab tu zhi ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ngan song rab tu zhi ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this perfection of moral discipline is that one pacifies the lower realms.

original: dbang po tshang ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dbang po tshang ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs senses are complete.

original: sems can rnams la nyon mongs pas mi gnod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la nyon mongs pas mi gnod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is not harmed by the passions of sentient beings.

original: sil snyan ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sil snyan ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that the cymbals sound without being played.

original: stong gsum du sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / lha rnams kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: stong gsum du sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / lha rnams kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The m aturation of this param ita of w isdom is that one gives gifts and creates m erit in the three thousand great thousands of worlds, and that one utters the sounds that delight the gods.

original: 'di dag ni mun pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mun pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of being w ithout darkness.

original: de la zil gyis mi non pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zil gyis mi non pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of being unoverpowered?

original: stong gsum dag na shing ljon pa dag las dus ma yin par me tog dang 'bras bu dag 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: stong gsum dag na shing ljon pa dag las dus ma yin par me tog dang 'bras bu dag 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The m aturation of this param ita of giving is that flowers and fruits grow out of season from the trees in the three thousand great thousands of worlds.

original: sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that all sentient beings are free from all feelings of suffering.

original: @105a *// sems can thams cad shin tu dbang po tshang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩlag mthil nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: @105a *// sems can thams cad shin tu dbang po tshang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // lag mthil nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: The maturation of this patience is that all sentient beings have complete faculties.üîΩThe maturation of this effort is that one is able to hold in the palm of one‚Äôs hand

original: stong gsum dag na bla na med pa bcu zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
analyzed: stong gsum dag na bla na med pa bcu zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
translated: and to overpower the unsurpassed in the billion-world universe.

original: gcig la gcig bsngags pa mang po brjod cing lha rnams la bdud rtsi stobs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gcig la gcig bsngags pa mang po brjod cing lha rnams la bdud rtsi stobs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that one praises the gods and offers them ambrosia.

original: bdud bzhi bcom pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: bdud bzhi bcom pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one conquers the four demons and realizes the wisdom of the equality of self and other.

original: 'di dag ni zil gyis mi non pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zil gyis mi non pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being unoverpowered.

original: de la bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of conquering the army of MƒÅra?

original: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na sems can thams cad bkres pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na sems can thams cad bkres pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that when one awakens to perfect buddhahood in the trichiliocosm, all sentient beings are free from hunger.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩlha'i bu'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // lha'i bu'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that the MƒÅra of the afflictions does not harm anyone.üîΩThe maturation of this patience is that the MƒÅra of the sons of the gods does not harm anyone.

original: 'chi bdag gi bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'chi bdag gi bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that the MƒÅra of the Lord of Death does not harm anyone.

original: phung po'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa @105b gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: phung po'i bdud su la'ang gnod pa med pa @105b gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that the MƒÅra of the skandhas does not harm anyone.

original: dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /
analyzed: dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one awakens to perfect buddhahood just as one has intended.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this perfection of wisdom is omniscience.

original: 'di dag ni bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections for destroying the army of Mara.

original: de la g-yo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la g-yo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that are unmoving?

original: byang chub kyi snying por skyel mo krung bcas pa la skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying por skyel mo krung bcas pa la skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this perfection of giving is that one is not weary of sitting cross-legged at the site of awakening.üîΩThe maturation of this morality is that one is fearless when seeing Mara.

original: bdud mthong na 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;lus la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bdud mthong na 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;lus la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this patience is that one is focused on the body.

original: sems la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sems la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that one is focused on the mind.

original: dam bcas pa las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that one does not change from one‚Äôs promise.

original: byang chub kyi phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the maturation of the perfection of wisdom for one who has attained to do just as one says for the sake of enlightenment.

original: 'di dag ni g-yo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni g-yo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of non-wavering.

original: de la skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections in one moment?

original: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de'i sbyor ba nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //üîΩgnyen pos 'joms pa @106a *//
analyzed: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de'i sbyor ba nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o // gnyen pos 'joms pa @106a *//
translated: The maturation of generosity is the application of that thought which fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment through the wisdom in one moment.

original: gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of morality is the destruction of the afflictions.

original: nga rgyal kun tu 'joms pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal kun tu 'joms pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of patience is the destruction of pride.

original: gzhan gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of effort is the realization of the equality of the thoughts of others.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that one has meditation in the realization of dependent origination.

original: chos thams cad la dus gsum du ma brjed pa mos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dus gsum du ma brjed pa mos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one has the wisdom of the three times with regard to all phenomena.

original: 'di dag ni skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the single instant.

original: de la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the non-equipoised?

original: sha'i mig gis sems can rnams la gzigs nas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la bde ba nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: sha'i mig gis sems can rnams la gzigs nas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la bde ba nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that one sees sentient beings with the fleshly eye and, seeing that they are suffering, one accomplishes their happiness.

original: lha'i mig gis dar ba dang rgud pa gzigs nas 'jig rten gyi thar pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig gis dar ba dang rgud pa gzigs nas 'jig rten gyi thar pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that one sees with the divine eye the flourishing and decline of the world and accomplishes the liberation of the world.

original: nyan thos rnam par 'jog cing gzhan la brtse ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nyan thos rnam par 'jog cing gzhan la brtse ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of one who is established as a disciple and who has compassion for others is the patience pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of one who accomplishes miracles and magical emanations is the effort pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: sems kyis lha'i sems gzigs nas chos ston pa ni /
analyzed: sems kyis lha'i sems gzigs nas chos ston pa ni /
translated: The meditative concentration of one who, having seen the minds of the gods, teaches the Dharma

original: dper na bram ze'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: is the meditative concentration pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: dus mkhyen nas smon nas shes pas chos ston pa @106b gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: dus mkhyen nas smon nas shes pas chos ston pa @106b gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The wisdom of one who, having known the time, teaches the Dharma with the knowledge of aspiration is the wisdom pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: 'di dag ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the non-equipoised.

original: de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of equipoise?

original: byang chub kyi snying por zang zing med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying por zang zing med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving pƒÅramitƒÅ is the meditative concentration pƒÅramitƒÅ of one who is free of materiality at the site of enlightenment.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The limb of enlightenment of complete refinement is the perfection of morality.

original: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The limb of enlightenment of joy is the perfection of patience.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
translated: The limb of enlightenment of investigation of phenomena is the perfection of effort.

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The limb of enlightenment of samadhi is the perfection of meditation. The limb of enlightenment of equanimity is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of equipoise.

original: de la yongs su smin par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs su smin par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections of ripening?

original: byang chub bsnyes nas gang dag sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir btang snyoms gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub bsnyes nas gang dag sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir btang snyoms gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that, having attained enlightenm ent, one is indifferent to the world in order to bring sentient beings to m aturation.

original: gsol ba ma btab par chos mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩtheg pa dman pa la mos pa @107a *//
analyzed: gsol ba ma btab par chos mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // theg pa dman pa la mos pa @107a *//
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one does not teach the Dharma to those who have not requested it.

original: rnams la lus dman pa mngon par sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rnams la lus dman pa mngon par sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one manifests a body inferior to that of those who are devoted to the Lesser Vehicle.

original: ltang rgyas 'od srung la gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ltang rgyas 'od srung la gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one gives instruction to the great Rishi, Urnavata.

original: sems can rnams kyis zhu ba zhus pa la skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis zhu ba zhus pa la skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one is never wearied by the questions of sentient beings.

original: zhus pa'i lan 'debs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: zhus pa'i lan 'debs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The m aturation of this param ita of w isdom is that one answers the questions.

original: 'di dag ni yongs su smin par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yongs su smin par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of bringing to m aturation.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the Buddha‚Äôs six perfections?

original: 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The ripening of the perfection of generosity is that the Dharma teaching is fruitful.

original: sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The ripening of the perfection of morality is that the Buddha‚Äôs deeds are fruitful.

original: nges pa'i tshig thams cad la spongs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig thams cad la spongs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The ripening of the perfection of patience is that one has mastery over all etymologies.

original: chos rnams la brjed pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la brjed pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The ripening of the perfection of effort is that one never forgets the Dharma.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi stobs gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi stobs gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The ripening of the perfection of concentration is that one has the power of the path that goes everywhere.

original: mi 'jigs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste; 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste; 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The ripening of the perfection of wisdom is that one has the realization of fearlessness. These are the Buddha‚Äôs six perfections.

original: de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of omniscience?

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @107b thogs pa med pa'i spyan gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @107b thogs pa med pa'i spyan gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The eye of unobstructed omniscient wisdom is the evolutionary development of the perfection of generosity.

original: 'khor gyi sems tshar gcad pa dang sems rab tu 'dzin pa mkhyen nas chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi sems tshar gcad pa dang sems rab tu 'dzin pa mkhyen nas chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma by the Buddha, who knows how to control and to hold the minds of the assembly, is the evolutionary development of morality.

original: bsnyen par dka' ba la zhes dang bcas pas nyan pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsnyen par dka' ba la zhes dang bcas pas nyan pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The listening to the Dharma with devotion by those who are difficult to benefit is the evolutionary development of tolerance.

original: dus mkhyen nas chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dus mkhyen nas chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma by the Buddha at the appropriate time is the evolutionary development of vigor.

original: lhag chad med par chos ston pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: lhag chad med par chos ston pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The skill in teaching the Dharma without excess or deficiency is the evolutionary development of meditation.

original: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin theg pa'i gtam go bar mdzad cing ched du brjod pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin theg pa'i gtam go bar mdzad cing ched du brjod pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The teaching of the Dharma by the Buddha, who knows the vehicles of all the disciples and who teaches the Dharma in accordance with their aspirations, is the evolutionary development of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of omniscience.

original: de la lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the remainderless?

original: lam sla ba myur bas nges par byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: lam sla ba myur bas nges par byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of giving is that one attains the path of ease and speed.

original: bde bar myur du yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bde bar myur du yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of morality is that one quickly attains maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of patience is that one attains the Buddha‚Äôs teachings.

original: dus gsum la gzhol ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dus gsum la gzhol ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of effort is that one attains the three times.

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa @108a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa @108a *//
translated: The maturation of meditation is that one attains the concentrations, liberations, meditative stabilizations, and meditative absorptions just as one wishes.

original: gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of wisdom is that one attains the knowledge of the three times.

original: tha dad du mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad du mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this perfection of wisdom is that one does not teach separately.

original: 'di dag ni lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections without remainder.

original: de la lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections with remainder?

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dang bstan pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dang bstan pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of giving is that one accomplishes the relics and the teachings of the parinirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la nyams pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la nyams pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of morality is that one‚Äôs recollection of the morality of the parinirvƒÅ·πáa is never lost.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of the perfection of patience is that one offers lamps to the st≈´pas of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la nyan thos gnas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa la bar chad mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la nyan thos gnas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa la bar chad mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that in the teachings of the Parinirvana, one does not create obstacles for the Shravakas who are engaged in effort.

original: rnam par 'phrul ba mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul ba mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that one attains the state of the successive absorptions of the emanations.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rab tu spyod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rab tu spyod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one practices with the supramundane faculty of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the remainder.

original: de la dang du len pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dang du len pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of acceptance?

original: 'di ltar sems @108b bstan pa la sems can rnams rnyed pa dang bkur sti la longs spyod cing yul la spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems @108b bstan pa la sems can rnams rnyed pa dang bkur sti la longs spyod cing yul la spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that in the teachings, sentient beings enjoy wealth and possessions and enjoy the objects.

original: bha ra dhva dza khros kyang ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bha ra dhva dza khros kyang ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the moral practice of Bharadv√¢ja, who was not disturbed even though he was angry.

original: mdzes ldan mo'i phyir mu stegs pa khri nyis stong gis mi snyan par bsgrags pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩyid kyis mthu stobs bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mdzes ldan mo'i phyir mu stegs pa khri nyis stong gis mi snyan par bsgrags pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // yid kyis mthu stobs bstan pa ni /
translated: The param ita of patience is the patience of the twelve thousand heretical teachers who reviled him for the sake of M at idev√Æ.

original: dper na byang chub sems dpa' sengger gyur pa na gnad du phog kyang dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na byang chub sems dpa' sengger gyur pa na gnad du phog kyang dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the effort of the Bodhisattva who, as a lion, endured being struck at the vital point.

analyzed: bkur sti ma byas kyang dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi phyir 'dri ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of wisdom is the wisdom of one who asks questions for the sake of m editation.

original: 'di dag ni dang du len pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dang du len pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of enduring.

original: de la gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: sbyin pa byin nas dul bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //

analyzed: ri bong gis bram zed la zo la nag tshal 'dug cig ces smras pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: byang chub ma thob pa'i phyir nges par byung ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

original: spyi bo dang rigs gsum gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: spyi bo dang rigs gsum gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: That meditation which is the crown and the three kinds of meditation is meditation.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: That knowledge which is the eighteen special attributes of a Buddha is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the other.

original: de la yang dag pa'i spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six perfections of the correct exertions?

original: sdig pa mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the non-production of evil, unwholesome states that have not yet arisen?

original: so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis mongs pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis mongs pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the afflictions through the power of discrimination is the maturation of the perfection of giving.

original: mi dag pa'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: mi dag pa'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims so //
translated: The contemplation of the unpleasant maturation of impurity is morality.

original: mi dge ba'i ngo bo khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i ngo bo khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The understanding of the nature of the unwholesome is patience.

original: mi skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: mi skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: The effort to understand the unborn is effort.

original: gzhan yang dag par len du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: gzhan yang dag par len du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The concentration that causes others to take up what is right is meditative stability.

original: sdig pa mi dge ba gtan du mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba gtan du mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste /
translated: The insight that is the complete non-arising of evil and unwholesome states is wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni sdig pa mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sdig pa mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of preventing the non-arising of evil and unwholesome states.

original: de la skyes pa rnams spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩnyon mongs pa skyes pa'i @111a *//
analyzed: de la skyes pa rnams spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / nyon mongs pa skyes pa'i @111a *//
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of abandoning what has arisen?

original: skyon mthong nas 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: skyon mthong nas 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that, having seen the faults of arisen afflictions, one abandons them.

original: de la smod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;de spong zhing 'bar ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la smod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;de spong zhing 'bar ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that one criticizes them. The maturation of this patience is that one abandons them and is not inflamed.

original: nyon mongs pa shes shing shes pas nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;gang la rtog cing dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa shes shing shes pas nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;gang la rtog cing dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the effort to overcome the afflictions by knowing them. The paramita of meditation is the meditation on the afflictions.

original: spong ba dang mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: spong ba dang mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the wisdom of the knowledge of abandonment and non-arising.

original: 'di dag ni skyes pa rnams spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni skyes pa rnams spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of abandoning what has arisen.

original: de la dge ba ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dge ba ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six paramitas of producing what has not arisen?

original: dge ba la 'dun cing rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnams par smin pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba la 'dun cing rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnams par smin pa'o //
translated: The paramita of generosity is the ripening of the aspiration for virtue and the absence of delusion.

original: dge ba thob pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dge ba thob pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of discipline is the joy of attaining virtue.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas dge ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas dge ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the investigation of virtue through the aspect of emptiness.

original: lus dang sems kyis pha rol gnon pa la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems kyis pha rol gnon pa la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this effort is that one is unimpeded in the practice of body and mind.

original: thob pa dang mtshan ma med par 'dzin pa la mi brjed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: thob pa dang mtshan ma med par 'dzin pa la mi brjed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this meditation is that one is not forgetful in grasping the signless and the attainment.

original: thob pa'i rgyu la mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: thob pa'i rgyu la mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one is not born from the cause of attainment.

original: 'di @111b dag ni dge ba ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di @111b dag ni dge ba ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections for the production of the not-yet-produced virtues.

original: de la dge ba skyes pa rnams phyir zhing gnas par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dge ba skyes pa rnams phyir zhing gnas par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections for the continued existence of the produced virtues?

original: dge ba skyes pa rnams chud za ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba skyes pa rnams chud za ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The maturation of this perfection of giving is that the produced virtues do not perish.

original: de dag la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: de dag la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The maturation of this morality is that one delights in them.

original: sbyor ba las sdod pa las nges par byung ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba las sdod pa las nges par byung ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of this effort is the patience of one who has definitely emerged from abiding.

original: kun tu srung zhing kun nas ma rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: kun tu srung zhing kun nas ma rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of this effort is the effort of one who is completely protected and completely undeluded.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs can gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs can gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of this effort is the power of meditation.

original: yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of this effort is the wisdom that engages in all dedications.

original: 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams phyir zhing gnas par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams phyir zhing gnas par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the arising of virtuous dharmas that abide again and again.üîΩ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the bases of miraculous powers?

original: de la 'dun pa spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dun pa spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'ang gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the base of miraculous powers that are endowed with the abandonment of aspiration?

original: 'dun pa de skye ba la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa de skye ba la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of aspiration is the aspiration that is unobstructed in arising.

original: 'dun pa de mi gtong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa de mi gtong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality is the non-abandonment of that aspiration.

original: dun pa de brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dun pa de brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience is the expression of that aspiration.

original: 'dun pa nges par byung ba 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa nges par byung ba 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort is the retention of the aspiration for definite emergence.

original: de la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan @112a *//
analyzed: de la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan @112a *//
translated: The meditation is the investigation of that.

original: gyi'o; ;'dun pa de la nges par thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gyi'o; ;'dun pa de la nges par thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom is the definite attainment of that aspiration.

original: 'di dag ni 'dun pa spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'dun pa spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the basis of supernormal power of aspiration and exertion.

original: de la brtson 'grus spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the basis of supernormal power of exertion?

original: cang mi smra bas thob pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;brtson 'grus la reg pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: cang mi smra bas thob pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;brtson 'grus la reg pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The giving is the exertion that is attained through silence. The morality is the contact with exertion.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: thob par rtsom zhing nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

original: des pa la chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩyongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: des pa la chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.
