translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the effort of being satisfied w ith gentleness.üîΩThe m aturation of this w

original: mtshan ma med pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the attainment of the signless.

original: sems kun nas dkris pa dang bral pa @112b gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems kun nas dkris pa dang bral pa @112b gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the freedom from the fetters of the mind.

original: bag la nyal kun nas 'joms pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bag la nyal kun nas 'joms pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the destruction of the latent tendencies.

original: 'di dag ni sems spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the bases of magical power that eliminate the mind.

original: de la dpyod pa spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpyod pa spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the bases of magical power that eliminate investigation?

original: dpyod pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the absence of dislike for investigation.

original: yang dag pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩrigs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // rigs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the attainment of the truth.üîΩThe paramita of patience is the realization of the reasoning.

original: rnam par gnon pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par gnon pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the attainment of all subjugations.

original: bag chags khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bag chags khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is the mastery of habitual tendencies is the perfection of meditation.

original: bag chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: bag chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: That which is the elimination of habitual tendencies is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dpyod pa spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dpyod pa spong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the basis of supernormal power of investigation.

original: de la bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the first concentration?

original: dmigs pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The attainment of the object is the perfection of giving.

original: khyim la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: khyim la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The examination of the household is the perfection of morality.

original: bsam gtan dang po ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The non-degeneration of the first concentration is the perfection of patience.

original: yan lag lnga spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yan lag lnga spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The elimination of the five factors is the perfection of effort.

original: rtse gcig pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rtse gcig pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The attainment of one-pointedness is the perfection of meditation.

original: yan lag lnga ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩ'di dag ni @113a *//
analyzed: yan lag lnga ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni @113a *//
translated: The possession of the five factors is the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the first concentration.

original: de la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the second concentration?

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la mtshan mar 'dzin pa spong zhing tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la mtshan mar 'dzin pa spong zhing tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The elimination of the apprehension of signs in the second concentration and the pliancy that arises from that is the perfection of generosity.

original: bar chad med par shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bar chad med par shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The uninterrupted cognition is the perfection of morality.

original: rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The investigation is the perfection of patience.

original: shugs mi gtong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: shugs mi gtong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The non-abandonment of energy is the perfection of effort.

original: thar pa la dmigs shing snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;bdag dang gzhan la phan pa dang ldan par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: thar pa la dmigs shing snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;bdag dang gzhan la phan pa dang ldan par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The meditative absorption that focuses on liberation is the perfection of concentration. The view that is beneficial to oneself and others is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the second concentration.

original: de la bsam gtan gsum pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan gsum pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the third concentration?

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i ro myang ba spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i ro myang ba spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The abandonment of the taste of the third concentration is the perfection of generosity.

original: ro myang ba med pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ro myang ba med pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one delights in the absence of relishing.

original: dga' ba don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dga' ba don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one strives for delight.

original: kun nas 'dzin cing ma brjed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'dzin cing ma brjed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is not forgetful and is fully engaged.

original: blo brtan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: blo brtan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs m ind is firm.

original: zag pa zad pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one has the cause of the exhaustion of the outflows.

original: 'di dag ni bsam gtan gsum @113b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsam gtan gsum @113b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the three m editations.

original: de la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six paramitas of the fourth meditation?üîΩThe m aturation of this giving is that one contem plates and abandons the happiness of the fourth meditation.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde ba la rtog cing spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;sdug bsngal la rtog cing spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩnub pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde ba la rtog cing spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;sdug bsngal la rtog cing spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // nub pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one contem plates and abandons suffering.üîΩThe m aturation of this patience is that one contem plates the w eakness of the fourth meditation.

original: btang snyoms thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one attains equanimity.

original: dran pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m indfulness that is attained.

original: yongs su dag pa thob nas 'chi ba med par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa thob nas 'chi ba med par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the dedication of immortality that is attained through purification. These are the six param itas of the fourth stabilization.

original: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the applications of mindfulness?

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the application of mindfulness of the body?

original: lus la mi sdug pa rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus la mi sdug pa rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the contemplation of the body as being ugly.

original: de la rtog pa la mi lta ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: de la rtog pa la mi lta ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the non-apprehending of that contemplation.

original: bdag med pa la mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa la mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the conviction of selflessness.

original: g-yo ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the vision of immobility.

original: ngo bo nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the vision of the essence.

original: skye ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: skye ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the insight into non-arising.

original: 'di dag ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la tshor ba dran pa @114a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la tshor ba dran pa @114a *//
translated: These are the six paramitas of the application of mindfulness to the body.

original: nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the application of mindfulness to sensation?

original: bde ba'i tshor ba la lhag par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i tshor ba la lhag par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the absence of attachment to pleasant sensations.

original: tshor ba sdug bsngal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba sdug bsngal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the insight into painful sensations.

original: stong pa nyid la mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the conviction in emptiness.

original: tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the absence of clinging to sensation.

original: bde ba'i tshor ba la mi lta ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i tshor ba la mi lta ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the lack of concern for pleasant sensations.

original: tshor ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis spong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: tshor ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis spong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the rejection of all feelings through the realization of their sam eness. These are the six param itas of the application of mindfulness of feeling.

original: de la sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the application of mindfulness of mind?

original: spong ba la dmigs pa'i sems mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: spong ba la dmigs pa'i sems mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the vision of the mind focused on rejection.

original: sems de'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems de'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the vision of the faults of the mind.

original: g-yo ba med pa la rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa la rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the discernment of immobility.

original: sems kyi spyod yul yang ba bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod yul yang ba bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the reversal of the domain of the mind.

original: gzhan gyi phyir sems dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyir sems dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the joy of the mind for the sake of others.

original: rkyen la rag las pa mthong nas mtshan ma med pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: rkyen la rag las pa mthong nas mtshan ma med pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the m editation on the signless, seeing that the mind is dependent on conditions.

original: 'di dag ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa @114b drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa @114b drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the application of mindfulness of the mind.

original: de la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the application of mindfulness of phenomena?

original: chos rnams kyi rnam pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rnam pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The seeing of the aspects of phenomena is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving.

original: chos rnams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The investigation of phenomena is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality.

original: chos rnams la skye bas dben pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la skye bas dben pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The isolation of phenomena is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience.üîΩThe abandonment of the view that holds the highest view is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort.

original: chos rnams la lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The abandonment of attachment to phenomena is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of concentration.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung la mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung la mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The seeing of dependent origination is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the application of mindfulness of phenomena.

original: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /üîΩbam po bdun pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / bam po bdun pa /
translated: The Good Eon

original: de la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of seeing the noble truth of suffering?

original: sdug bsngal yongs su gtong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su gtong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the giving up of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal la yid byung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la yid byung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one sees the disgust with suffering.

original: sdug bsngal gsob tu mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gsob tu mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one sees the hollowness of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal chen por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one sees the great suffering.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩsdug bsngal yongs su shes pa mthong ba gang yin @115a *//
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa mthong ba gang yin @115a *//
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one sees the nature of suffering.

original: pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one sees the full knowledge of suffering.

original: 'di dag ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of seeing the noble truth of suffering.

original: de la kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the truth of the arising of suffering?

original: kun 'byung ba yongs su gtong ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba yongs su gtong ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The thought of giving up the arising of suffering is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving.

original: kun 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: Seeing the faults of the arising of suffering is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality.

original: tshogs pa las byung ba las dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa las byung ba las dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The analysis of what arises from a collection is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience.

original: srid pa'i 'khor mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khor mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: Seeing the wheel of existence is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort.

original: kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal ba 'joms par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal ba 'joms par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: Seeing the destruction of the entanglements and latent tendencies is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of concentration.

original: nges par spong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩ'di dag ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: nges par spong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: Seeing the definite abandonment is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom.üîΩThese are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the truth of the arising of suffering.

original: de la 'gog pa'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'gog pa'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the truth of cessation?

original: 'gog pa la reg par byas nas smon pa nub pa sgom pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa la reg par byas nas smon pa nub pa sgom pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the meditation that, having touched cessation, causes the setting of aspirations to cease.

original: 'gog pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩ'du shes 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // 'du shes 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the joy in cessation.üîΩThe param ita of patience is the cessation of perception.

original: tshor ba 'gog pa la gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩdben pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba 'gog pa la gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // dben pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the cessation of feeling.üîΩThe param ita of m editation is the application to solitude.

original: 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir snyoms par 'jug @115b pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir snyoms par 'jug @115b pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the sam adhi that is directed to the realization of cessation.

original: 'di dag ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
translated: These are the six param itas of the Truth of Cessation.

original: de la lam gyi bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lam gyi bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the Truth of the Path?

original: lam gyi grogs thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lam gyi grogs thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the attainment of the support of the path.

original: lam la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lam la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the joy in the path.

original: lam gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;lam gyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lam gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;lam gyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The observation of the object of the path is the perfection of effort.

original: lam la ma rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: lam la ma rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The non-delusion of the path is the perfection of concentration.

original: chos thams cad dngos po ji lta ba bzhin lam gyis shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po ji lta ba bzhin lam gyis shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The knowledge of the path of all things as they are is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni lam gyi bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lam gyi bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the truth of the path.

original: de la dad pa'i dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; dad nas tshul khrims 'chal pa spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la dad pa'i dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; dad nas tshul khrims 'chal pa spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the faculty of faith? The abandonment of immorality out of faith is the perfection of generosity.

original: dad pa rjes su sgom pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dad pa rjes su sgom pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The cultivation of faith is the perfection of morality.

original: dad pa'i mchog tu dga' ba thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i mchog tu dga' ba thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The attainment of the joy of supreme faith is the perfection of patience.

original: dad pa'i gnas yang dag pa kun nas rab tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i gnas yang dag pa kun nas rab tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The complete retention of the basis of faith is the perfection of effort.

original: thar pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: thar pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The faith that is associated with the faculty of liberation is the perfection of meditation.

original: byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa'i dad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩ'di dag ni dad pa'i dbang po'i @116a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa'i dad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni dad pa'i dbang po'i @116a *//
translated: The faith that is a vessel for enlightenment is the perfection of wisdom.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the faculty of faith.

original: de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the faculty of perseverance?

original: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po yid la bcags pa med cing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po yid la bcags pa med cing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perseverance of the faculty of perseverance that is without mental activity and is heroic is the perfection of giving.

original: 'dus byas la lhag par zhen pa med cing 'dus ma byas la blta ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas la lhag par zhen pa med cing 'dus ma byas la blta ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The view of the uncompounded without attachment to the compounded is the perfection of morality.

original: bya ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The absence of obstruction in all activities is the perfection of patience.

original: thag ring po yongs su bsngo ba'i smon lam gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thag ring po yongs su bsngo ba'i smon lam gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The aspiration to dedicate to the distant is the perfection of perseverance.

original: dus dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dus dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of dhyana is the diligence that is timely.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of prajna is the nature of the Dharma, both mundane and supramundane.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas similar to the faculty of diligence.

original: de la dran pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas similar to the faculty of mindfulness?

original: yang dag pa mthong nas khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyon spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa mthong nas khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyon spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the avoidance of the faults of holding a household when one has seen the truth.

original: 'dus byas kyi 'bras bu dang 'jig rten la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi 'bras bu dang 'jig rten la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the investigation of the world and the results of compounded phenomena.

original: nyon mongs pas skyo ba med cing sdug bsngal bar mi sems pa gang yin pa de ni bzod @116b pa'i'o; ;chos rnams 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas skyo ba med cing sdug bsngal bar mi sems pa gang yin pa de ni bzod @116b pa'i'o; ;chos rnams 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the absence of weariness with afflictions and the absence of thoughts of suffering. The paramita of effort is the retention of the Dharma.

original: nye bar zhi ba dag pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba dag pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the purity of complete peace.

original: sems can thams cad la chos rnams kyis rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la chos rnams kyis rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the enrichment of all beings with the Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni dran pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dran pa'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas similar to the faculty of mindfulness.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas similar to the faculty of samadhi?

original: tshegs chung dus nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshegs chung dus nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the faculty of samadhi that eliminates the secondary mental afflictions with little difficulty.

original: ting nge 'dzin la brten pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la brten pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the faculty of samadhi that is based on samadhi.

original: ting nge 'dzin shin tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin shin tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the faculty of samadhi that is well-established in samadhi.

original: chos rnams kyi rnam pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rnam pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the faculty of samadhi that focuses on the aspects of the Dharma.

original: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The one-pointed concentration that is meditative stability is the perfection of meditative stability.

original: ting nge 'dzin stobs can gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stobs can gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The powerful concentration that is wisdom is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are associated with the faculty of meditative stability.

original: de la shes rab kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; dngos po thams cad brtags nas spong ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; dngos po thams cad brtags nas spong ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections that are associated with the faculty of wisdom? The wisdom that is the rejection of all things after examining them is the perfection of generosity.

original: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The wisdom that is non-attachment is the perfection of discipline.

original: @117a *// sems can gyi nyon mongs pa bzod pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: @117a *// sems can gyi nyon mongs pa bzod pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The wisdom that is the patience with the afflictions of sentient beings is the perfection of patience.

original: rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The wisdom that is the retention of the realization of the nature is the perfection of diligence.

original: nye bar zhi ba la dmigs pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba la dmigs pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the wisdom that focuses on complete peace.

original: thar pa mi sgrub pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: thar pa mi sgrub pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the wisdom that does not achieve liberation.

original: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas similar to the faculty of wisdom.

original: de la dad pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dad pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas similar to the power of faith?

original: dad pa mi 'phrog pa ni /
analyzed: dad pa mi 'phrog pa ni /
translated: The paramita of giving is the unstealable faith.

original: dper na rgyal po gzhon nu sengge'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po gzhon nu sengge'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o //
translated: For example, it is like the faith of Prince Simha.

original: tshul khrims kyis bsgoms pa nyams pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis bsgoms pa nyams pa ni /
translated: The paramita of morality is the morality of one who does not lose the meditation of faith.

original: dper na glang po che'i phru gus me long ma dran nas zas yi za ba lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na glang po che'i phru gus me long ma dran nas zas yi za ba lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: For example, it is like the elephant calf who does not remember the mirror and eats the food.

original: rus pa so sor gyes kyang byams pa mi gtong ba ni /
analyzed: rus pa so sor gyes kyang byams pa mi gtong ba ni /
translated: The paramita of patience is the patience of one who does not abandon love even when the bones are separated.

original: dper na srog chags su gyur pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩthogs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus ni /
analyzed: dper na srog chags su gyur pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // thogs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus ni /
translated: The patience of a bodhisattva is like that of the animal in the Jataka of the Bodhisattva as the Stag.

original: dper na rgya mtsho chen po skem pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na rgya mtsho chen po skem pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of a bodhisattva is like that of the one who dried up the great ocean.

original: chos bzang gi khang bzang du bsam gtan bskyed pa na rnam par rtog pa rnams 'jog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan @117b gyi'o; ;'phags pa nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: chos bzang gi khang bzang du bsam gtan bskyed pa na rnam par rtog pa rnams 'jog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan @117b gyi'o; ;'phags pa nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab ni /
translated: The meditation of a bodhisattva is like that of the one who generated the meditation in the palace of the Good Dharma and stopped the conceptualizations.

original: dper na brtson 'grus spyod pa'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dper na brtson 'grus spyod pa'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of a bodhisattva is like that of the one who practiced effort in the Noble Liberation.

original: 'di dag ni dad pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dad pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the power of faith.

original: de la brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the power of effort?

original: shin tu bzod cing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: shin tu bzod cing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity of a bodhisattva is to be very patient and to be able to endure the hardships of practice.

original: mthu can la gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang de la dang du len pa ni /üîΩdper na rgyal po'i bu ku sha'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩspyod pa thos kyang dang du len pa ni /üîΩdper na mig bzang btsun mo dam pas yi chad kyang dang du len pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mthu can la gzhan gyis gnod pa byas kyang de la dang du len pa ni / dper na rgyal po'i bu ku sha'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // spyod pa thos kyang dang du len pa ni / dper na mig bzang btsun mo dam pas yi chad kyang dang du len pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The morality of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe patience of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe effort of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.

original: sred pas mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩbsam gtan thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩskye ba las 'das kyang rjes su 'jug pa'i shes rab ni /
analyzed: sred pas mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // bsam gtan thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // skye ba las 'das kyang rjes su 'jug pa'i shes rab ni /
translated: The meditation of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe wisdom of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.

original: dper na bram ze'i bu bla ma'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dper na bram ze'i bu bla ma'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The generosity of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe morality of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe patience of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe effort of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.üîΩThe meditation of a bodhisattva is to be able to endure the harm done by others, even though one is powerful.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs associated with the power of diligence.

original: de la dran pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs associated with the power of mindfulness?

original: lha yul dag dran pa rgyun mi chad kyang lha'i 'dod pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni @118a sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lha yul dag dran pa rgyun mi chad kyang lha'i 'dod pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni @118a sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity of not being attached to the pleasures of the gods, even though one is constantly mindful of the god realms, is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of generosity.

original: lha'i bu mo dag gi nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lha'i bu mo dag gi nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of seeing the faults of the daughters of the gods is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality.

original: gzhal med khang dag la mngon par dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gzhal med khang dag la mngon par dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of not delighting in the celestial palaces is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience.

original: lhar gyur nas thar pa la re ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lhar gyur nas thar pa la re ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of hoping for liberation after becoming a god is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort.

original: lha'i 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: lha'i 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of not dwelling in the distractions of the retinue of gods is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of meditation.

original: lha rnams chos ston pa la mngon par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: lha rnams chos ston pa la mngon par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of not being attached to the gods teaching the Dharma is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dran pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dran pa'i stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections similar to the power of mindfulness.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections similar to the power of concentration?

original: dngos po yongs su btang nas ting nge 'dzin la dga' ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po yongs su btang nas ting nge 'dzin la dga' ba ni /
translated: The joy of concentration after giving up all possessions

original: dper na rgyal po lha chen pos rgyal srid por te rab tu byung ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po lha chen pos rgyal srid por te rab tu byung ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: is like that of King MahƒÅdeva, who renounced his kingdom and went forth. This is the perfection of giving.üîΩThe mental application that is the remainder of the body and speech

original: sems kyi sbyor ba lus dang ngag gi lhag ma gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems kyi sbyor ba lus dang ngag gi lhag ma gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: is the perfection of morality.üîΩThe action of doing what is good

original: legs par byed pa'i las byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: legs par byed pa'i las byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: is the perfection of patience.üîΩThe realization of the Dharma just as it is

original: chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: is the perfection of effort.üîΩThe insight into empty phenomena

original: stong pa'i chos la lhag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i chos la lhag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: is the perfection of meditation.

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyis ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni @118b dper na rdza mkhan gyi khyim du sman chen lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyis ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni @118b dper na rdza mkhan gyi khyim du sman chen lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is not affected by worldly dharmas is like the great medicine in the potter's house.

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs associated with the power of samƒÅdhi.

original: de la shes rab kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩmgo yongs su btang yang sgyid ma lug pa ni /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / mgo yongs su btang yang sgyid ma lug pa ni /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs associated with the power of wisdom?

original: dper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //üîΩgzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba ni /
analyzed: dper na yul ka shi'i rgyal po lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o // gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba ni /
translated: Not being discouraged even when one‚Äôs head is cut off is like the king of KƒÅ≈õi.üîΩThat is the perfection of generosity.üîΩGiving oneself out of love for others is like the bodhisattva yak·π£a who gave himself up for the sake of the travelers and safely reached the human sacrifice.

original: dper na 'gron po'i don du byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin la bdag nyid btang ste mi'i gtor ma bde bar phyin pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na 'gron po'i don du byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin la bdag nyid btang ste mi'i gtor ma bde bar phyin pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: That is the perfection of morality.

original: mu tig gi phyir rgya mtshor lan gsum du 'gron ni tas phug kyang bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mu tig gi phyir rgya mtshor lan gsum du 'gron ni tas phug kyang bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience that is the patience of one who has gone to sea three times for pearls, and who has been pierced by swords, is the patience pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: legs sdug sdug bsngal thob nas sbyin pa mi sbyin zhing sems zhum pas lan bdun du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: legs sdug sdug bsngal thob nas sbyin pa mi sbyin zhing sems zhum pas lan bdun du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort that is the effort of one who, having obtained suffering, does not give gifts, but who, with a depressed mind, has gone to sea seven times, is the effort pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: skye ba rnams su ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba rnams su ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditative absorption that is the perfection of meditative absorption just as one wishes in one‚Äôs lives is the meditative absorption pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: ston pa btang ba na byang chub sems dpa' gsol ba 'debs kyis tshul legs par chom rkun g-yag po khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ston pa btang ba na byang chub sems dpa' gsol ba 'debs kyis tshul legs par chom rkun g-yag po khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom that is the wisdom of a bodhisattva who, when his teacher is taken away, supplicates him properly and understands the bandits to be yak·π£as, is the wisdom pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /üîΩde la dran pa @119a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi stobs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / de la dran pa @119a *//
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs associated with the power of wisdom.

original: yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the factor of complete awakening that is mindfulness?

original: mi dge ba spong ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o /
analyzed: mi dge ba spong ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o /
translated: The mindfulness that abandons nonvirtue is the perfection of giving.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i 'du shes la gnas pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i 'du shes la gnas pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The mindfulness that abides in the perception of what is pleasing is the perfection of morality.

original: chos rnams kyi brda dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi brda dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The mindfulness of the symbols of the teachings is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus chung mi za ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus chung mi za ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The mindfulness that does not abandon small efforts is the perfection of effort.

original: stobs rnams rnam par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams rnam par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The cultivation of the powers is the perfection of meditation.

original: dran pa dang thar pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dran pa dang thar pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The power of mindfulness and liberation is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the factor of perfect awakening that is mindfulness.

original: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the factor of perfect awakening that is the investigation of phenomena?

original: chos rnam par 'byed pas skyon spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pas skyon spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the abandonment of faults through the investigation of phenomena.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pas thar pa dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pas thar pa dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena is the morality that is in accord with liberation.

original: mtha' gnyis yongs su spong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis yongs su spong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena is the patience that abandons the two extremes.üîΩThe effort of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena is the effort that is uninterrupted in the discernment of phenomena.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos rnam par 'byed pa sgro mi 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos rnam par 'byed pa sgro mi 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena is the meditation that is not attached to the discernment of phenomena.

original: 'di dag thams cad la mi 'dzin par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab @119b kyi ste; 'di dag ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad la mi 'dzin par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab @119b kyi ste; 'di dag ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The wisdom of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena is the wisdom that does not grasp at anything. These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the factor of perfect discernment of phenomena.

original: de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the factor of perfect effort of enlightenment?

original: rtogs nas rjes su chags pa'i dngos po spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rtogs nas rjes su chags pa'i dngos po spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of the factor of perfect effort of enlightenment is the giving that abandons the things that one is attached to after having understood them.

original: brtson 'grus bla na med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;brtson 'grus la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus bla na med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;brtson 'grus la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the unsurpassed effort. The param ita of patience is the effort that is not fixated on anything.

original: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba bsal ba la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba bsal ba la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the effort that does not abide in the absence of self, sentient beings, life, or nourishment.

original: kun tu sbyor ba rnams la ji mi mjed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba rnams la ji mi mjed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the effort that is not disturbed by the fetters.

original: bdag nyid dpyod cing bzo thams cad sgrub la sa bdun pa'i shes pa yongs su ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid dpyod cing bzo thams cad sgrub la sa bdun pa'i shes pa yongs su ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the effort that is not exhausted by the knowledge of the seventh spiritual level, the effort that is the analysis of the self and the accom plishm ent of all the arts.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the branch of enlightenm ent that is effort.

original: de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the branch of enlightenment that is pliancy?

original: lus shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the pliancy of the body.

original: sems shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the m editation of the m ind that is totally purified.

original: 'khor ba la brkam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩshin du sbyangs pa rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni @120a *//
analyzed: 'khor ba la brkam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // shin du sbyangs pa rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni @120a *//
translated: The param ita of patience is the m editation of the m ind that is not greedy for samsara.

original: brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩshin du sbyangs pa sgom pa'i so sor brtags pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi'o // shin du sbyangs pa sgom pa'i so sor brtags pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the m editation of the m ind that is totally purified and never interrupted.üîΩThe param ita of m editation is the m editation of the m ind that is totally purified and is the discernment of each and every thing.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the m editation of the m ind that is totally purified and is the true investigation of things.

original: 'di dag ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the branch of enlightenm ent of the m editation of total purification.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the branch of enlightenment of samadhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the attainment of the noble samadhi.

original: thob pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: thob pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the non-displeasure in the attainment.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the branches of samadhi is the patience of the one who is not attached.üîΩThe effort of the branches of samadhi is the effort of the one who is not attached.

original: ting nge 'dzin rgyun chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;blta zhing rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rgyun chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;blta zhing rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the branches of samadhi is the meditation of the one who is not attached.

original: rtogs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of the branches of samadhi is the wisdom of the one who is not attached.

original: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the branch of enlightenment of samadhi.

original: de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six paramitas of the branch of enlightenment of equanimity?

original: dga' ba ci spangs kyang gdung pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ci spangs kyang gdung pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity of the branch of enlightenment of equanimity is the generosity of the one who is not attached to any kind of joy.

original: lus dang / ngag btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lus dang / ngag btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of the branch of enlightenment of equanimity is the morality of the one who is not attached to body and speech.

original: sems can gyis dben pa la mi gnas pa @120b gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can gyis dben pa la mi gnas pa @120b gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the branch of enlightenment of equanimity is the patience of the one who is not attached to the isolation of sentient beings.

original: sgyu ma la mi gnas pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma la mi gnas pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the effort to not abandon the non-abiding in illusions.

original: sems ma gtugs shing yid byung ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems ma gtugs shing yid byung ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m editation of one w ho is not w earied or discouraged.

original: chos thams cad la skad cig par rtog cing dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: chos thams cad la skad cig par rtog cing dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom of one w ho has the instant realization of all things and accepts them.

original: 'di dag ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the branch of enlightenm ent of right equanimity.

original: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of right view?

original: 'phags pa yang dag pa'i lta ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa yang dag pa'i lta ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the realization of the right view of the noble ones.

original: khong du chud nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: khong du chud nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the realization of the absence of all-conflicting emotions.

original: khong du chud nas rigs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: khong du chud nas rigs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the realization of the understanding of the right view.

original: nges par brtags nas gzhan la phan pa thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nges par brtags nas gzhan la phan pa thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the effort to benefit others by examining them thoroughly.

original: mtha' yas pa la dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa la dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation is the m editation of one w ho exam ines the infinite.

original: rnam par smin pa sdug pa gang yin pa de ni shes kyi ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa sdug pa gang yin pa de ni shes kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom of one w ho has a pleasant m aturation.

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of right view.

original: de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of right thought?

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i rnam par smin par byed pa spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i rnam par smin par byed pa spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the giving that m atures the abandonment of right thought.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩrkyen ji lta @121a *//
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa la mi dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // rkyen ji lta @121a *//
translated: The param ita of morality is the morality of one w ho never has any dislike for right thought.

original: ba rnams la sa dang sa ma yin pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ba rnams la sa dang sa ma yin pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the patience of one w ho knows the proper and improper conditions of right thought.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa sbyor ba thams cad la mi bsten pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa sbyor ba thams cad la mi bsten pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i dbang gis yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i dbang gis yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation of right thought is the dedication of the power of right thought.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par yang dag par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par yang dag par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom of right thought is the right thought of the worldly and the transcendent, whether they be right or w rong.

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of right thought.

original: de la yang dag pa'i ngag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i ngag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of right speech?

original: tshig skyon med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshig skyon med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving of right speech is the faultless speech.

original: tshig rigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: tshig rigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality of right speech is the speech that is appropriate.

original: 'phags pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshig sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshig sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort of right speech is the speech of the right discriminations that is accomplished.

original: 'jig rten pa mngon par dga' ba'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩtshig bden pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa mngon par dga' ba'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // tshig bden pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The power of eloquence is the power of meditation.üîΩThe power of truth is the power of wisdom.üîΩ

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i ngag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i ngag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one‚Äôs w ords are w hat the w orld delights in. These are the six param itas of right speech.

analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of right action?

original: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one‚Äôs right action has a result.

original: yang @121b dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i bsam pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yang @121b dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i bsam pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one attains the intention of right action.

original: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' thams cad du mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' thams cad du mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs application to right action is non-apprehending. The m aturation of this effort is that one‚Äôs right action is not engaged in anyw here.

original: gnas pa med pa yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ma brtags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ma brtags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom that is not w ithin the realm of the m aturation of karma.

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of right activity.

original: de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snying rje gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snying rje gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: chos rtogs pas nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

analyzed: sems can med pas nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: zang zing med pas nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of ‚Äúright livelihood‚Äù is the wisdom that is sustained by the absence of worldly concerns.

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of right livelihood.

original: de la yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩthams cad spangs te dgon pa'i gnas @122a *//
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / thams cad spangs te dgon pa'i gnas @122a *//

original: me 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: me 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that, having given up everything, one goes to the forest.üîΩThe m aturation of this morality is that one throws away the fire.

analyzed: lus dang / ngag yang dag pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one applies oneself to the right use of body and speech.

original: dmigs pa la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa la mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one does not dwell on the objective.

original: gzungs thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gzungs thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one attains the dh√¢ranis.

original: brda la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: brda la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one applies oneself to the use of symbols.

original: gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one is not harmed.

original: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of right effort.

original: de la yang dag pa'i dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; 'dus byas la mi lta ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; 'dus byas la mi lta ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the perfection of right mindfulness? The mindfulness that does not look at the compounded is the perfection of giving.

original: chos thams cad kyi skyon dang yon tan 'jal bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi skyon dang yon tan 'jal bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

original: rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: bag yod pa'i rnam par smin pa dran pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i thob pa la brjed pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: zhi gnas bsgoms pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the perfection of right samƒÅdhi?

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i @122b 'o; ;yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i @122b 'o; ;yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one delights in right sam√†dhi. The m aturation of this morality is that one‚Äôs right sam√†dhi is well-established.

analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo rnam par 'grol ba dang lta ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
