analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par 'ongs pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyen po yongs su gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six p√†ram it√†s of right sam√†dhi.

analyzed: de la zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: sgrib pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la gzhan gyis nyams par byar med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one‚Äôs sam adhi cannot be destroyed by others.

original: ye shes kyi sbyor ba ma rgud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sbyor ba ma rgud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs application of knowledge is not lost.

original: bsam pa thams cad rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this param ita of w isdom is that one realizes all one‚Äôs intentions.

original: 'di dag ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas focused on calm abiding.

original: de la lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang @123a *//
analyzed: de la lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang @123a *//
translated: What are the six paramitas focused on profound insight?

original: zhe na; ma thos par chos rnams mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zhe na; ma thos par chos rnams mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of generosity is the expression of the Dharma without having heard it.

original: skyon med par mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skyon med par mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is the expression of the absence of faults.

original: skye bo mang po 'dod par mngon par brjod par gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po 'dod par mngon par brjod par gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of patience is the expression of the desire of many beings.üîΩThe transcendent perfection of diligence is the expression of the perfection of eloquence.

original: ldem po dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos kyi nyid mtshams sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ldem po dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;chos kyi nyid mtshams sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of concentration is the expression of the perfection of the connection with the nature of phenomena.

original: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom is the expression of the absence of subjugation.

original: 'di dag ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six transcendent perfections related to insight.

original: de la rig pa la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rig pa la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six transcendent perfections related to knowledge?

original: rig pa la sbyor ba grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;'dod par 'gyur ba'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rig pa la sbyor ba grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;'dod par 'gyur ba'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one is skilled in the knowledge of the path. The m aturation of this morality is that one is skilled in the knowledge of the desire realm.

original: rig pa thams cad la gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rig pa thams cad la gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one is skilled in all knowledge.

original: rig pa'i sa thams cad la gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩchos thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i sa thams cad la gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // chos thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is skilled in all the stages of knowledge.üîΩThe m aturation of this m editation is that one is skilled in the knowledge of all the Dharmas.

original: chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i rig pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one is skilled in the knowledge of all the Dharmas.

original: 'di dag ni rig pa la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rig pa la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the focus on knowledge.

original: de la rnam par grol ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the accomplishment of liberation?

original: rnam par @123b grol ba la myur du zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rnam par @123b grol ba la myur du zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one quickly enters into liberation.

original: bag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one is free from habitual tendencies.

original: mthar 'dzin pa yongs su spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mthar 'dzin pa yongs su spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one completely abandons the holding of extreme views.

original: thams cad du de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad du de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is not of the nature of all.

original: dus thams cad du bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi 'phrog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;de kho na'i chos kyi rgyu mthun pa'i thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dus thams cad du bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi 'phrog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;de kho na'i chos kyi rgyu mthun pa'i thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one is never taken over by happiness or suffering. The m aturation of this w isdom is that one is the all-inclusive cause of the Dharma of suchness.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par grol ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the attainment of liberation.

original: de la dge slong gi 'khor nye bar 'ong ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dge slong gi 'khor nye bar 'ong ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the attainment of the assembly of monks?

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin thams cad du sprul pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin thams cad du sprul pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one emanates in all ways just as one wishes.

original: ci 'dod par sprul pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod par sprul pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one emanates just as one wishes.

original: de'i bsam pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i bsam pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs wishes are expressed.

original: khyad par du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: khyad par du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: That which is expressed as special is that of effort.

original: sems la 'dzin pa med par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems la 'dzin pa med par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is expressed as non-grasping of mind is that of meditation.

original: de las nges par grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: de las nges par grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is expressed as liberation from that is that of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dge slong gi 'khor nye bar 'ong ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dge slong gi 'khor nye bar 'ong ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections for accomplishing the assembly of monks.

original: de bzhin du bshad pa 'dis na 'khor brgyad po thams cad la'ang sbyar bar shes par bya'o //üîΩde la don so so yang @124a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du bshad pa 'dis na 'khor brgyad po thams cad la'ang sbyar bar shes par bya'o // de la don so so yang @124a *//
translated: In the same way, by this explanation, one should understand the application to all eight assemblies.

original: dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: Therein, what are the six perfections for accomplishing the correct knowledge of the meaning?

original: don brjod pa dang don ma yin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: don brjod pa dang don ma yin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: That which is expressed as meaning and that which is expressed as non-meaning is that of giving.

original: skye bo mang po tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang po tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: That which satisfies many beings is that of morality.

original: don la skyon med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: don la skyon med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: That which is faultless in meaning is that of patience.

original: 'og min gyi gnas nas bzung ste phan tshun bden pa rgya cher smra pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'og min gyi gnas nas bzung ste phan tshun bden pa rgya cher smra pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the effort to speak extensively about the truth with each other, beginning from the Akanishta realm.

original: mtshungs pa rnams don la chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa rnams don la chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the contentment with the meaning of the equal.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the undistracted nature of the unequal.

original: 'di dag ni don so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni don so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of accomplishing the correct discernment of meaning.

original: de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six paramitas of accomplishing the correct discernment of phenomena?

original: chos mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos mngon par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of generosity is the expression of the abhidharma.

original: gzhan la go bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gzhan la go bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of discipline is the understanding of others. The paramita of patience is the dedication to the truth.

original: rgyun ma chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rgyun ma chad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the uninterrupted continuity.

original: chos gnas pa dang de bzhin nyid gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos gnas pa dang de bzhin nyid gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is the stability of phenomena and suchness that does not change is the perfection of concentration.

original: rtag tu zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rtag tu zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is never overwhelmed is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni chos so so yang dag par @124b rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos so so yang dag par @124b rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the accomplishment of the analytical knowledge of phenomena.

original: de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the accomplishment of the analytical knowledge of definitions?

original: gtam gyi phyir nges pa'i tshig gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gtam gyi phyir nges pa'i tshig gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The essence of definition for the sake of speech is the perfection of generosity.

original: nye bar zhi ba la nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba la nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The definition of peace is the perfection of morality.

original: 'jig rten pa'i ngag thams cad la nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i ngag thams cad la nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The definition of all worldly speech is the perfection of patience.

original: de dag thams cad la go bas byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
analyzed: de dag thams cad la go bas byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o /
translated: The activity of understanding all of them is the perfection of effort.

original: dam bcas pa sgrol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa sgrol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one liberates those who have taken vows.

original: thar pa dang 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: thar pa dang 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one is liberated and ceases.

original: 'di dag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six p√†ram it√¢s of the accomplishment of the analytical knowledge of linguistic expression.

original: de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six p√†ram it√¢s of the accomplishment of the analytical knowledge of eloquence?

original: spobs pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: spobs pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one has various kinds of eloquence.

original: spobs pa mnyen pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;de dag thams cad tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: spobs pa mnyen pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;de dag thams cad tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one‚Äôs eloquence is gentle. The m aturation of this patience is that one satisfies all.

original: ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is not exhausted.

original: the tshom gcod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩmya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: the tshom gcod pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩmya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs eloquence cuts through doubt.üîΩThe m aturation of this w isdom is that one‚Äôs eloquence is directed toward N irvana.

original: 'di dag ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin @125a *//üîΩpa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin @125a *// pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of accomplishing the correct knowledge of eloquence.

original: de la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being completely indefatigable?

original: chos ston pa na chos nyan pa rnams la chos bstan pas mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos ston pa na chos nyan pa rnams la chos bstan pas mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The indefatigability of teaching the Dharma to those who listen to the Dharma is the result of giving.

original: sems can la phan par sgrub pas mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan par sgrub pas mi skyo ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The indefatigability of accomplishing benefit for sentient beings is the result of morality.

original: sku rang gis bshig ste rgya cher byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sku rang gis bshig ste rgya cher byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The blessing of the body being destroyed and becoming vast is the result of patience.

original: gdul ba rnams kyi ched du dus thams cad du nye bar 'ong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gdul ba rnams kyi ched du dus thams cad du nye bar 'ong ba'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The magical power of always coming near for the sake of those to be tamed is the result of effort.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na gdams ngag ster ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na gdams ngag ster ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The bestowal of instructions while remaining in meditative equipoise as one wishes is the result of concentration.

original: dus dang dus ma yin par chos nyan pa rnams la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /üîΩ'di dag ni /
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin par chos nyan pa rnams la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste / 'di dag ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the teaching of as much Dharma as is desired to those who listen to the Dharma at the right time and the wrong time.

original: yongs su skyo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: yongs su skyo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of not being discouraged.

original: de la sbyin pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sbyin pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections that arise from generosity?

original: slong ba la byin nas bde bar yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: slong ba la byin nas bde bar yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is the dedication of one‚Äôs happiness to those who have received one‚Äôs gifts.

original: lus dang ngag gi lhag par sbyin pa byin pas dang pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi lhag par sbyin pa byin pas dang pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the generosity of one‚Äôs body and speech.

original: sbyin pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the joy of generosity.üîΩThe perfection of effort is the heroism of generosity.

original: sbyin pa byin pa na pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus @125b kyi'o; ;sems dang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa byin pa na pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus @125b kyi'o; ;sems dang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is the clarity of mind.

original: sbyin pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom is the dedication of generosity to enlightenment.

original: 'di dag ni sbyin pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sbyin pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that definitely emerge from generosity.

original: de la tshul khrims las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshul khrims las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that definitely emerge from morality?

original: bslab pa yang dag par blang ba byin pa dang / sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bslab pa yang dag par blang ba byin pa dang / sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of the precepts and the giving of fearlessness to sentient beings is the perfection of generosity.

original: mi 'jigs pa byin pa la 'khrug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa byin pa la 'khrug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The absence of disturbance in giving fearlessness is the perfection of morality.

original: sems can rnams la phan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The intention to benefit sentient beings is the perfection of patience.

original: bslab pa kun nas srung zhing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bslab pa kun nas srung zhing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The protection of the precepts and the conquest of others is the perfection of effort.

original: bslab pa sngon du btang nas sems can rnams la phan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bslab pa sngon du btang nas sems can rnams la phan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The intention to benefit sentient beings after having previously taken up the precepts is the perfection of meditation.

original: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is dedicated to enlightenment is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni tshul khrims las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni tshul khrims las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that arise from morality.

original: de la bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections that arise from patience?

original: sems can bde na dang ba gang yin de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can bde na dang ba gang yin de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience that is clarity when sentient beings are happy is the perfection of giving.

original: sems can kyi nyon mongs pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can kyi nyon mongs pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The patience that is the afflictions of sentient beings is the perfection of morality.

original: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas skye ba la mi mjed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas skye ba la mi mjed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience that is not weary of birth in cyclic existence from beginningless time is the perfection of patience.

original: rtag tu rgyun @126a *//
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun @126a *//
translated: The patience that is the constant,

original: mi chad par nges par rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mi chad par nges par rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: uninterrupted, and definite undertaking is the perfection of effort.

original: sems can la phan par nges pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan par nges pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The patience that is definite in benefiting sentient beings is the perfection of meditation.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The patience that is dedicated to omniscience is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bzod pa las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that arise from patience.

original: de la brtson 'grus las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that arise from effort?

original: 'jig rten la phan par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la phan par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one is engaged in benefiting the world.

original: gnod pa med par pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: gnod pa med par pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one is invincible.

original: sdug bsngal thob pa thar par byas pa ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal thob pa thar par byas pa ni /
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one is liberated from the suffering one has obtained.

original: dper na thi ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //üîΩsbyor ba ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na thi ba'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o // sbyor ba ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: For example, it is like the story of the dove.üîΩThe m aturation of this effort is that one never abandons one‚Äôs practice.

original: brtson 'grus kyis sgrib pa sel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis sgrib pa sel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs effort is free from obscurations.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul du yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one dedicates to the realm of the Buddha.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that arise from effort.

original: de la bsam gtan las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the certainty of meditation?

original: byams pa gtso bo'i bsam gtan sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: byams pa gtso bo'i bsam gtan sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of the meditation of the chief of love, which is endowed with the benefit of sentient beings, is the perfection of giving.

original: sems can la phan pa'i 'du shes can gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa @126b de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa'i 'du shes can gyi bsam gtan gang yin pa @126b de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the perception of the benefit of sentient beings is the perfection of morality.

original: 'jig rten la phan par sems spro ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la phan par sems spro ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The joy of the thought of benefitting the world is the perfection of patience.

original: nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The certainty of deliverance through complete peace is the perfection of effort.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa legs par bsam nas smra ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa legs par bsam nas smra ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The good thought of the gift of the Dharma is the perfection of meditation.

original: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩ'di dag ni bsam gtan las /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i nges pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / 'di dag ni bsam gtan las /
translated: The etymological explanation of natural abiding is the perfection of wisdom.

original: nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the certainty of meditation.

original: de la shes rab las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes rab las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that arise from wisdom?

original: chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that I give the gift of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med par smra ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med par smra ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that I speak w ithout m atter of the gift of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that I never tire of giving the gift of the Dharma.

original: dad pas nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dad pas nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that I am liberated through faith.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa legs par bsams nas smra ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa legs par bsams nas smra ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that I speak having well considered the gift of the Dharma.

original: rang bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / nges pa'i tshig shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / nges pa'i tshig shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that I know the nature of things as they are and the nature of words.

original: 'di dag ni shes rab las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni shes rab las nges par byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that arise from wisdom.

original: de la rnam par smin pa mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the ripening of the eye?

original: mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mig gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin @127a *//
analyzed: mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mig gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin @127a *//
translated: The eyes that are delightful to behold are the karmic maturation of generosity.

original: pa'o; ;mig blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩthag ring por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: pa'o; ;mig blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // thag ring por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The eyes that are beautiful to behold are the karmic maturation of discipline.üîΩThe eyes that see from afar are the karmic maturation of patience.

original: mig dkyus ring ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mig dkyus ring ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The eyes that are long are the karmic maturation of diligence.

original: bltas pas dang bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bltas pas dang bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The eyes that are clear are the karmic maturation of concentration.

original: kun nas shin tu dang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: kun nas shin tu dang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The eyes that are completely clear are the karmic maturation of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs whose karmic maturation is the eyes.

original: de la rnam par smin pa rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs whose karmic maturation is the ears?

original: rna ba nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rna ba nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The ears that are unimpaired are the karmic maturation of generosity.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The ears that are pure are the karmic maturation of discipline.

original: rna ba'i khams shin tu dang ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i khams shin tu dang ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The ear element of clarity is the perfection of patience.

original: rna ba cha phra ba thos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba cha phra ba thos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The ear element of hearing the subtle is the perfection of effort.

original: rna ba thag ring ba thos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba thag ring ba thos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The ear element of hearing from afar is the perfection of concentration.

original: bkur sti ma yin pa thos na mi dga' ba med pa'i rna ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bkur sti ma yin pa thos na mi dga' ba med pa'i rna ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The ear element of not being displeased by hearing disrespect is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the ear element of ripening.

original: de la rnam par smin pa sna'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa sna'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of the nose element of ripening?

original: dang bar 'gyur ba'i sna gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dang bar 'gyur ba'i sna gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The nose element of clarity is the perfection of generosity.

original: sna'i dbang po nyams pa gang yin pa de @127b ni; tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩyid du 'ong ba snom pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sna'i dbang po nyams pa gang yin pa de @127b ni; tshul khrims kyi'o // yid du 'ong ba snom pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The nose element of the unimpaired nose sense is the perfection of discipline.üîΩThe nose element of smelling what is pleasant is the perfection of patience.

original: mi mthun pa snom pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa snom pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The nose element of smelling what is unpleasant is the perfection of effort.

original: sna ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sna ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this meditation is that one is not offended.

original: skyon snom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: skyon snom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one does not smell faults.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa sna'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa sna'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the nose.

original: de la rnam par smin pa lce'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa lce'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the tongue?

original: lces ro myangs na dang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lces ro myangs na dang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one is refreshed w hen one tastes w ith the tongue.üîΩThe m aturation of this morality is that one is not arrogant.

original: khengs tshig med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;skye bo mang po 'dod pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: khengs tshig med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o; ;skye bo mang po 'dod pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one‚Äôs words are desired by m any people.

original: yi ge mang po rjes su dran par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yi ge mang po rjes su dran par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one is mindful of m any syllables.

original: lce rkan la gzhar ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: lce rkan la gzhar ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that the tongue is placed on the palate.

original: lce mchog gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: lce mchog gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that the tongue is the best.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa lce'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa lce'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the tongue.

original: de la rnam par smin pa lus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa lus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the body that are the result of evolution?

original: lus shas rgyas shing mdog dmar ser gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus shas rgyas shing mdog dmar ser gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The body that is very full and reddish-yellow is from giving.

original: skye bo mang pos blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: skye bo mang pos blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The body that is pleasing to look at for many beings is from morality.

original: lus dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The body that is renowned for its great power is from patience.

original: lus brtan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: lus brtan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The body that is firm is from effort.

original: lus shin tu gzhon @128a *//
analyzed: lus shin tu gzhon @128a *//
translated: The body that is very youthful

original: sha chags pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sha chags pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: and tender is from meditation.

original: gtso bor 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: gtso bor 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The body that is the chief of all is from wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa lus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa lus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the body that are the result of evolution.

original: de la rnam par smin pa sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the mind that are the result of evolution?

original: sems 'dod chags chung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;zhe sdang chung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems 'dod chags chung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o; ;zhe sdang chung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The generosity of a mind with little desire is the generosity of one with little desire. The morality of a mind with little anger is the morality of one with little anger.

original: gti mug med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gti mug med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of a mind without ignorance is the patience of one without ignorance.

original: rtogs pa rno ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;sbyor ba dang rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa rno ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;sbyor ba dang rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The effort of a mind with sharp understanding is the effort of one with sharp understanding. The meditation of a mind in accord with application is the meditation of one in accord with application.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin chos thams cad khong du chud pa mang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin chos thams cad khong du chud pa mang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The wisdom of a mind that has realized all phenomena as desired is the wisdom of one who has realized all phenomena as desired. These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the mind that is the result of evolution.

original: de la gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i zang zing gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i zang zing gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of material that is dedicated to benefiting others?

original: gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyin pa ni /
translated: The generosity of maturing others is the generosity of one who matures others.

original: dper na rgyal po'i bu snying stobs /
analyzed: dper na rgyal po'i bu snying stobs /
translated: For example, it is like the generosity of the prince Sattva.

original: zhum pa med kyis dzambu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams tshim par byas nas thams cad kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byas pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zhum pa med kyis dzambu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams tshim par byas nas thams cad kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byas pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The maturation of this giving is that, without being discouraged, one satisfies the beings of Jambudvipa and brings them all to maturity for enlightenment.

original: gzhan la phan pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par @128b smin pa snying stobs ni /
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par @128b smin pa snying stobs ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe strength of morality that is dedicated to the benefit of others‚Äù

original: dper na sreg pas mis tshig par byed pa bsod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dper na sreg pas mis tshig par byed pa bsod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: means, for example, the strength of morality that is like the fire that burns the wood of the afflictions.

original: gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa 'khor ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa 'khor ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe patience of samsara that is the dedication of the benefit to others‚Äù

original: dper na tshangs pas sems can drug cu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa bzod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dper na tshangs pas sems can drug cu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa bzod pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni /
translated: means, for example, the patience of Brahma who, in order to bring sixty beings to maturity, tolerated the afflictions.

original: bzod pa'i 'o; ;gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i 'o; ;gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe effort to bring others to maturity‚Äù

original: dper na nad srog gi lhag ma lus pa la lo bdun cur phan par bya ba'i 'dod pa'i yid kyis dpag tshad bdun brgyar song nas ri gangs can las sman blangs te nad pa thar par byas pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

translated: The param ita of w isdom is the w isdom of one who com poses treatises and com piles the letters in order to bring benefit to sentient beings.

analyzed: phan par 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //

analyzed: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: bdag kha dog rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

translated: The perfection of concentration is the concentration that enters the higher realms for one‚Äôs own sake.üîΩFor example, the perfection of concentration is the concentration that one does not come to this world for seven eons of destruction.

analyzed: 'di dag ni bdag la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i zang zing gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: de la don gyi pha rol tu phin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: bzod pa'i 'bras bu gzugs bzang ba gang yin pa de ni de'i don to //

analyzed: spong ba'i rgyus rab tu mi rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: chos la bzod pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: sbyor ba thams cad grub pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that all one‚Äôs activities are accomplished.

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam @130a *//
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs m editation is the cessation of the result.

analyzed: gtan gyi'o // rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one‚Äôs w isdom is the vajra-like samadhi.

original: 'di dag ni rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

original: de la spro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: sbyin pa byin pa na nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid du ma gyur cing bdag la dga' ba mi bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: When one gives a gift, one is never dull or sleepy, and one does not generate any self-satisfaction.

original: dper na sh'akya chen po'i nags khrod dpag tshad dgu bcu rtsa drug pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //

analyzed: bslab pa'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te spong ba ni / dper na rgyal po'i bu don yod gnas na 'dug cing brdzun tu smra ba mi zer blta bu dang / lus kyi phyir gzhan dag pha ma gsod cing sdig pa dag byed pa na ngas sbyin pa dang chos ma spangs pas de ni sangs rgyas yin no bar the tshom med par shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Abandoning a kingdom for the sake of training isüîΩfor example, like the prince Amoghavairocana, who did not speak falsely,

original: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: pha rol rjes su srung ba'i bzod pa ni /

analyzed: dper na glang po che gnang du phog kyang srung ba lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

translated: The m aturation of this effort is that, like the elephant, I am not harmed even though I am struck for thirty-six thousand years by the Dharma teacher.üîΩThe m aturation of this m editation is that, like the elephant, I am not harmed even though I am struck for thirty-six thousand years by the Dharma teacher.

original: dzambu'i gling nas bdag nyid mtho ris su song ba bram ze'i bu phan tshol gyi sngon gyi tshul las shes par bya blta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩshes rab ni /üîΩdper na sman chen gyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling nas bdag nyid mtho ris su song ba bram ze'i bu phan tshol gyi sngon gyi tshul las shes par bya blta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // shes rab ni / dper na sman chen gyi lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

original: 'di dag ni spro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni spro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: sa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //

analyzed: nges pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: bya ba thams cad du thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la mtshan ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

analyzed: thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //

analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

analyzed: rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: yongs su gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni @131a *// shes rab kyi ste /

analyzed: 'di dag ni mtshan ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //

analyzed: bar mdor chud me mdor chud me za ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //

analyzed: thar pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //

analyzed: bag chags 'don pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

original: 'di dag ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: de la gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of others?

analyzed: byang chub snying por skyil mo krung gcig gis sku ma dub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //

analyzed: sgyu mar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

analyzed: de la rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

original: tshong pa go gon gyis mchod ston gsol ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshong pa go gon gyis mchod ston gsol ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The offering of a feast by the merchant Go·πáa is the result of his generosity.

original: klu btang bzung gis dkris te bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: klu btang bzung gis dkris te bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The fact that he remained wrapped up by the nƒÅga Anavatapta is the result of his morality.

original: tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs nas gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs nas gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The fact that BrahmƒÅ came and made a request is the result of his patience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The fact that he was seen with the Buddha‚Äôs eye is the result of his effort.

original: gdul ba rnams yang dang yang gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: gdul ba rnams yang dang yang gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The fact that he saw the disciples again and again is the result of his concentration.

original: gti mug med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na /
analyzed: gti mug med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na /
translated: When he turned the wheel of the Dharma of non-delusion,

original: 'di ltar gcig nas gcig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra mngon par grags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
analyzed: 'di ltar gcig nas gcig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra mngon par grags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste //
translated: the sound resounded from one to another up to the Brahma world, which is the result of his wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the other‚Äôs full ripening.

original: de la sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of application?

original: lnga po dag nye bar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lnga po dag nye bar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The five who approached him are the perfection of giving.

original: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa de ni thos nas dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa de ni thos nas dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The one who accepted what he heard about what should and should not be done is the perfection of morality.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The one who remained without pride is the perfection of patience.

original: bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The one who satisfied them with nectar is the perfection of effort.

original: lnga po dag la bka' stsol cing go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩlhag bye @132a *//
analyzed: lnga po dag la bka' stsol cing go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // lhag bye @132a *//
translated: The one who spoke and made himself understood to the five is the perfection of meditation.

original: ba phrag lnga po dag la bdud rtsi rtogs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ba phrag lnga po dag la bdud rtsi rtogs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The one who caused the five hundred to understand nectar is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of application.

original: de la gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the possible and the impossible?

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nyid thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nyid thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one attains what is right and what is not right.

original: dam bcas pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one‚Äôs com m itm ents are never changed.

original: yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one has right understanding.

original: dam bcas pa stobs can gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;smra ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa stobs can gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;smra ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one‚Äôs com m itm ents are strong. The m aturation of this m editation is that one‚Äôs speech is never changed.

original: dus shes nas sgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi'o /
analyzed: dus shes nas sgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi'o /
translated: The m aturation of this wisdom is that one m editates knowing the time.

original: 'di dag ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of what is right and what is not right.

original: de la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the com m itm ents of past, future, and present karma?

original: las kyi skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: las kyi skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one has the thought of the birth of karma.

original: las kyi rgyu las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: las kyi rgyu las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one has the thought of the cause of karma.

original: rkyen la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;las rnams kyi spong ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rkyen la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o; ;las rnams kyi spong ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The patience of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the conditions of karma.üîΩThe effort of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the abandonment of karma.

original: spong pa'i thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: spong pa'i thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the means of abandoning karma.

original: spong ba'i skye ba med @132b pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: spong ba'i skye ba med @132b pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the non-arising of karma.

original: 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of taking up past, future, and present karma.

original: de yi 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yi 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the various worlds?

original: sems can rnams kyi khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The giving of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the realms of sentient beings.

original: khams tha dad pa ma yin pa la rtog pa gang yin bde ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: khams tha dad pa ma yin pa la rtog pa gang yin bde ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the non-differentiation of realms.

original: khams la sems can med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: khams la sems can med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the bodhisattva is the investigation of the absence of sentient beings in realms.

original: khams kyi sbyor ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩkhams rab tu sgrub pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: khams kyi sbyor ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // khams rab tu sgrub pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the realization of the elements of practice.üîΩThe param ita of m editation is the realization of the establishm ent of the elements.

original: khams kyi nges par byung ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: khams kyi nges par byung ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom is the realization of the definitive deliverance of the elements.

original: 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the various worlds.

original: de la dbang po yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang po yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the knowledge of the perfection of the faculties?

original: lus rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lus rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the realization of the body.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the realization of the eyes, ears, nose, and tongue.

original: sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the realization of the mind.

original: pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde @133a *//
analyzed: pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde @133a *//
translated: The param ita of effort is the realization of the male and female faculties, the life faculty, the faculty of pleasure, the faculty of pain, the faculty of mental pleasure, the faculty of mental displeasure, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po ste /
translated: the faculty of sorrow, the faculty of mental pain, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: dbang po drug po 'di dag rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dbang po drug po 'di dag rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The realization of these six faculties is the perfection of effort.

original: dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The realization of the faculties of faith, etc., is the perfection of meditation.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste /
translated: The realization of the faculty of the knowledge of all things and the faculty of the possession of the knowledge of all things is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the complete faculties.

original: de la 'jig rten gyi mos pa du ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gyi mos pa du ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the many worldly inclinations?

original: mos pa la sbyor ba yang dag par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mos pa la sbyor ba yang dag par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the application of inclination is the perfection of giving.

original: sbyor ba de la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba de la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The non-obstruction of that application is the perfection of morality.

original: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin dus la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin dus la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of those who reflect on the time of their aspirations is the patience pƒÅramitƒÅ.üîΩThe effort of those who reflect on the certainty of their realization is the effort pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;skye ba dang // mi skye ba'i zad pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o; ;skye ba dang // mi skye ba'i zad pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of those who reflect on the exhaustion of birth and non-birth is the meditation pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: mos pa de lta bur nye bar zhi ba dang / thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: mos pa de lta bur nye bar zhi ba dang / thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of those who reflect on the pacification of such aspiration and on the means is the wisdom pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: 'di dag ni mos pa du ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mos pa du ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the many aspirations.

original: de la thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the path that goes everywhere?

original: dka' ba bul @133b bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dka' ba bul @133b bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The generosity of those who realize the difficult and slow is the generosity pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: dka' ba myur bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩsla ba bul bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dka' ba myur bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // sla ba bul bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The morality of those who realize the difficult and fast is the morality pƒÅramitƒÅ.üîΩThe patience of those who realize the easy and slow is the patience pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: sla ba myur bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: sla ba myur bar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of those who realize the easy and fast is the effort pƒÅramitƒÅ.

original: 'gro ba dang 'brel par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'brel par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The param ita of dhyana is the realization of the connection with beings.

original: 'gro ba dang 'brel ba yod pa dang med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'brel ba yod pa dang med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The param ita of wisdom is the realization of the connection with beings as both existent and nonexistent.

original: 'di dag ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the path that goes everywhere.

original: de la dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, the dhyanas, the liberations, the samadhis, and the absorptions?

original: chos 'di rnams kyi bde ba 'di nges pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chos 'di rnams kyi bde ba 'di nges pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of giving is the certainty of the bliss of these dharmas.

original: cang shes pa mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: cang shes pa mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of morality is the sameness of the one who is skilled in the arts.

original: gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The param ita of patience is the Dharma that is dedicated to the benefit of others.

original: bdag la phan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bdag la phan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The param ita of effort is the benefit for oneself.

original: snod ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: snod ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the realization of the vessel as it is.

original: rgyu mthun pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /üîΩde dag ni dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms @134a *//
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste / de dag ni dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms @134a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the realization of the natural outcome.

original: par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the faculties, the powers, the limbs of enlightenment, the meditative concentrations, the liberations, the meditative stabilizations, and the absorptions.

original: de la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of recollecting former abodes?

original: sngon gyi gnas lus kyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas lus kyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the realization of former abodes by means of the body.

original: 'gro ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the realization of migrations.

original: las kyi mtha' rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: las kyi mtha' rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the realization of the limits of karma.

original: nyon mongs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the realization of afflictions.

original: sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the realization of the mind.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ji snyed pa kun yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ji snyed pa kun yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the correct vision of all the aspects of nirvana.

original: 'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of the recollection of former abodes.

original: de la lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the divine eye?

original: lha'i mig dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of giving is the clarity of the divine eye.

original: sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the absence of any reproach in one's practice.

original: thag ring por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: thag ring por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is seeing from afar.

original: ma lus par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ma lus par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is seeing without exception.

original: rgyud pa dang / dar ba dang / bkur sti med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rgyud pa dang / dar ba dang / bkur sti med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is seeing the absence of continuity, expansion, and respect.

original: de dag gi nges par byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: de dag gi nges par byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /

original: 'di dag ni lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the divine eye.

original: de @134b la zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de @134b la zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /

original: zag pa'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zag pa'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one sees the faults of defilements.

original: zag pa rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: zag pa rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
