original: zag pa rnams la mi blta zhing sems kyis gtong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zag pa rnams la mi blta zhing sems kyis gtong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one does not look at defilements and one gives them up in one‚Äôs mind.

original: zag pa rnams la mi rtog par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //üîΩzag pa rnams kyi yang dag par yongs su shes nas spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: zag pa rnams la mi rtog par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o // zag pa rnams kyi yang dag par yongs su shes nas spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one realizes the non-conceptuality of defilements.üîΩThe m aturation of this m editation is that one abandons defilements by fully understanding them.

original: zag pa rnams kyi bag chags kyi nyid mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: zag pa rnams kyi bag chags kyi nyid mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one gives up the latent tendencies of defilements.

original: 'di dag ni zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the power of the destruction of defilements.

original: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: The perfect, complete Buddha has fully awakened to these phenomena.

original: zhes mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhes mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the first fearlessness?

original: sangs rgyas rigs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rigs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of generosity is the realization of the Buddha‚Äôs lineage.

original: dam bcas pa ma zhum pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩyang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa ma zhum pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of discipline is the unshakable commitment.üîΩThe pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience is the correct realization.

original: thams cad thugs su chud pa ma gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad thugs su chud pa ma gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of perseverance is the complete understanding.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //üîΩ'khor brgyad kyi nang na @135a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o // 'khor brgyad kyi nang na @135a *//
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of concentration is the realization of omniscience.

original: bag tsha ba mi mnga' zhing dam bcas pa brtan po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bag tsha ba mi mnga' zhing dam bcas pa brtan po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom is the fearlessness in the midst of the eight assemblies.

original: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the first fearlessness.

original: de la yang dag par zag pa zad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang dag par zag pa zad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the complete extinction of defilements?

original: zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The extinction of defilements is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving.

original: bag chags sel ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bag chags sel ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The elimination of habitual tendencies is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality.

original: skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The absence of birth is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience.

original: yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The complete understanding is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort.

original: dam bcas pa 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi g-yos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi g-yos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The unshakability of one‚Äôs vow by the eight worldly concerns is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of meditation.

original: rnam par grol ba la nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The absence of decline in liberation is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the second fearlessness.

original: de la nges par 'byin pa'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nges par 'byin pa'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the path that leads to deliverance?

original: lam thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lam thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The investigation of the path‚Äôs methods is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving.

original: 'thob par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩ'gog pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'thob par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // 'gog pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The one who is intent on attaining is the morality perfection.üîΩThe one who is intent on cessation is the patience perfection.

original: 'jug bar byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: 'jug bar byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The one who is intent on engaging is the effort perfection.

original: rab tu 'jog par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'jog par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The one who is intent on settling is the meditation perfection.

original: rnam par grol bar byed @135b pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol bar byed @135b pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The one who is intent on liberation is the wisdom perfection.

original: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the third fearlessness.

original: de la bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the Dharma discourse on obstacles?

original: bar du gcod pa rnams la skye ba med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa rnams la skye ba med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The one who is intent on the non-arising of obstacles is the giving perfection.

original: ma skyes par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: ma skyes par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The one who realizes non-arising is the morality perfection.

original: chags pa med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: chags pa med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The one who is intent on non-attachment is the patience perfection.

original: bar du gcod pa rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The one that is the absence of the unwholesome in the face of obstacles is that of effort.

original: bar du gcod pa rnams la the tshom med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa rnams la the tshom med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The one that is the absence of doubt in the face of obstacles is that of meditation.

original: bar du gcod pa rnams la chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen pos nges pa dang / ma nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa rnams la chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen pos nges pa dang / ma nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The one that is the certainty and uncertainty in the face of obstacles, whether small, middling, or great, is that of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go ///
analyzed: 'di dag ni bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go ///
translated: These are the six perfections of the discourse on the Dharma of obstacles.

original: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //
analyzed: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //
translated: ƒÄrya-bhadrakalpika-nƒÅma-mahƒÅyƒÅna-s≈´tra

original: bam po brgyad pa //
analyzed: bam po brgyad pa //
translated: Fascicle 8

original: de la snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of great compassion?

original: sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The great compassion that is endowed with benefit for sentient beings is that of giving.

original: sems mnyam pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: sems mnyam pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The equanimity of mind is that of morality.

original: sems can rnams la gnod pa dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la gnod pa dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this patience is that one accepts harm to sentient beings.

original: @136a *// sems can nye bar 'ong ba rnams thar par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: @136a *// sems can nye bar 'ong ba rnams thar par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this effort is that one liberates those sentient beings who come to one.

original: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yon tan la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yon tan la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this m editation is that one places those who are devoted in virtue.

original: 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The m aturation of this w isdom is that one liberates from samsara.

original: 'di dag ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of great compassion.

original: de la sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of the purification of the eye of flesh?

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams gnyis dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams gnyis dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The m aturation of this giving is that one has clarity of the two elements of earth and water.

original: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams gnyis kyis brtan nas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams gnyis kyis brtan nas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The m aturation of this morality is that one has clarity of the two elements of fire and air.

original: rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan rnams 'dres pa'i skyon gyis ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan rnams 'dres pa'i skyon gyis ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the absence of disturbance due to the fault of a combination of wind, bile, and phlegm.

original: spyan blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: spyan blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the beauty of the eyes.

original: rigs par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rigs par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The paramita of meditation is the proper vision.

original: ma lus par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ma lus par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The paramita of wisdom is the vision of the totality.

original: 'di dag ni sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas that purify the fleshly eye.

original: de la lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas that purify the divine eye?üîΩThe paramita of giving is the divine eye that sees the body of form.

original: lha'i spyan gyis gzugs kyi lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin @136b pa'i 'o; ;nam mkha'i lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: lha'i spyan gyis gzugs kyi lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin @136b pa'i 'o; ;nam mkha'i lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of morality is the divine eye that sees the body of space.

original: rgud pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rgud pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The paramita of patience is the divine eye that sees misfortune.

original: dar ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: dar ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The paramita of effort is the divine eye that sees prosperity.

original: rgyu gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: That which is seen as a cause is that of concentration.

original: so sor gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: so sor gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: That which is seen individually is that of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections for purifying the divine eye.

original: de la shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections for purifying the eye of wisdom?

original: bsgoms pas 'grub pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pas 'grub pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The eye of wisdom that is accomplished through meditation and that which is seen is that of giving.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa thar pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa thar pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The attainment of liberation in nirvana is that of morality.

original: mngon par brjod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The state of abiding in verbal expression is that of patience.

original: gzigs pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: gzigs pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The state of abiding in seeing is that of effort.

original: blta bar bya ba la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: blta bar bya ba la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The correct seeing of what is to be seen is that of concentration.

original: 'jug pa byang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa byang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the purification of the eye of insight.

original: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that purify the eye of wisdom.

original: de la chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections that purify the eye of Dharma?

original: chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa'i rgyu gang yin ba de ni sbyin pa'i @137a *//
analyzed: chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa'i rgyu gang yin ba de ni sbyin pa'i @137a *//
translated: The perfection of generosity is the cause for attaining the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'o; ;de dag thob ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //üîΩrnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'o; ;de dag thob ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o // rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The perfection of discipline is the attainment of those qualities.üîΩThe perfection of patience is the vision of the eighteen distinctive qualities.

original: ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the vision of their essence.

original: sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the vision of their application.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the vision of their inexhaustibility.

original: chud mi za bar gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: chud mi za bar gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste; 'di dag ni chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that purify the eye of Dharma.‚Äù

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that purify the eye of the Buddha?

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The eye of the Buddha sees without obstruction: this is the result of giving.

original: phan par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: phan par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The eye of the Buddha sees what is beneficial: this is the result of morality.

original: rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The eye of the Buddha sees in detail: this is the result of patience.

original: ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The eye of the Buddha sees the essence: this is the result of effort.üîΩThe eye of the Buddha sees the application: this is the result of meditation.

original: sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;rnam par dben pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o; ;rnam par dben pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The eye of the Buddha sees in isolation: this is the result of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that purify the eye of the Buddha.

original: de la rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of self-arising?

original: rang byung lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rang byung lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: The self-arising that is spontaneously present: this is the result of giving.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa gang @137b yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa gang @137b yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: The morality of the bodhisattva is the stability of the mind in accordance with the thought.

original: rang gi spong ba'i rgyu rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: rang gi spong ba'i rgyu rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o //
translated: The patience of the bodhisattva is the attainment of the cause of the abandonment.

original: rab tu dbye ba shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o //
translated: The effort of the bodhisattva is the attainment of the knowledge of the classification.

original: rnam pa thams cad la nye bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad la nye bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o //
translated: The meditation of the bodhisattva is the investigation of all aspects.

original: ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste /
translated: The wisdom of the bodhisattva is the knowledge of all things as they are.

original: 'di dag ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six paramitas of self-arising.

original: de la rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six paramitas of play?

original: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pas rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pas rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
translated: The maturation of giving is the magical emanation.

original: dper na / chu bo gangg'ar gdugs lnga brgya lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: dper na / chu bo gangg'ar gdugs lnga brgya lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: For example, the five hundred parasols on the Ganges River. This is the giving.
